trans-unit.source: Represents a window or dialog box that makes up an application's user interface.
trans-unit.target: 表示组成应用程序的用户界面的窗口或对话框。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> is a representation of any window displayed in your application.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>是在你的应用程序中显示任何窗口的表示形式。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> class can be used to create standard, tool, borderless, and floating windows.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>类可以用于创建标准、 工具中无边框和浮动窗口。

trans-unit.source: You can also use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> class to create modal windows such as a dialog box.
trans-unit.target: 你还可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>类，以创建如对话框中的模式窗口。

trans-unit.source: A special kind of form, the multiple-document interface (MDI) form, can contain other forms called MDI child forms.
trans-unit.target: 一种特殊的窗体中，多文档界面 (MDI) 窗体中，可以包含其他调用 MDI 子窗体的窗体。

trans-unit.source: An MDI form is created by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.IsMdiContainer%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 通过设置创建的 MDI 窗体<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.IsMdiContainer%2A>属性`true`。

trans-unit.source: MDI child forms are created by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.MdiParent%2A> property to the MDI parent form that will contain the child form.
trans-unit.target: 通过设置来创建 MDI 子窗体<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.MdiParent%2A>到 MDI 父窗体将包含的子窗体的属性。

trans-unit.source: Using the properties available in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> class, you can determine the appearance, size, color, and window management features of the window or dialog box you are creating.
trans-unit.target: 使用中可用的属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>类，你可以确定要创建的窗口或对话框中的外观、 大小、 颜色和窗口管理功能。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Text%2A> property allows you to specify the caption of the window in the title bar.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Text%2A>属性允许你指定的窗口标题的标题栏中。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Size%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.DesktopLocation%2A> properties allow you to define the size and position of the window when it is displayed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Size%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.DesktopLocation%2A>属性允许你定义的大小和窗口的位置，它显示时。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A> color property to change the default foreground color of all controls placed on the form.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A>颜色属性可以更改的默认前景色的所有控件置于窗体。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormBorderStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.MinimizeBox%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.MaximizeBox%2A> properties allow you to control whether the form can be minimized, maximized, or resized at run time.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormBorderStyle%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.MinimizeBox%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.MaximizeBox%2A>属性允许您控制是否窗体可以最小化、 最大化时，或在运行时调整大小。

trans-unit.source: In addition to properties, you can use the methods of the class to manipulate a form.
trans-unit.target: 除了属性外，你可以使用类的方法来操作窗体。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ShowDialog%2A> method to show a form as a modal dialog box.
trans-unit.target: 例如，你可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ShowDialog%2A>方法来显示某个窗体作为模式对话框。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.SetDesktopLocation%2A> method to position the form on the desktop.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.SetDesktopLocation%2A>方法在桌面上定位窗体。

trans-unit.source: The events of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> class allow you to respond to actions performed on the form.
trans-unit.target: 事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>类可以响应在窗体上执行的操作。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Activated> event to perform operations such as updating the data displayed in the controls of the form when the form is activated.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Activated>事件以执行操作，例如更新时激活该窗体的窗体控件中显示的数据。

trans-unit.source: You can use a form as the starting class in your application by placing a method called `Main` in the class.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用窗体作为起始类在你的应用程序通过将调用的方法`Main`类中。

trans-unit.source: In the `Main` method add code to create and show the form.
trans-unit.target: 在`Main`方法添加代码以创建并显示窗体。

trans-unit.source: You will also need to add the `STAThread` attribute to the `Main` method in order for the form to run.
trans-unit.target: 你还需要添加`STAThread`属性设为`Main`方法按顺序运行的表单。

trans-unit.source: When the starting form is closed, the application is also closed.
trans-unit.target: 当启动窗体关闭时，应用程序也将关闭。

trans-unit.source: If you set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enabled%2A> property to `false` before the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> is visible (for example, setting <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enabled%2A> to false in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_visualstu](~/includes/tlasharptla-visualstu-md.md)] designer), the minimize, maximize, close, and system buttons remain enabled.
trans-unit.target: 如果你设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enabled%2A>属性`false`之前<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>可见 (例如，设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enabled%2A>中为 false[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_visualstu](~/includes/tlasharptla-visualstu-md.md)]设计器)，则最小化，使最大化，关闭和的系统按钮，保持启用状态。

trans-unit.source: If you set <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enabled%2A> to `false` after the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> is visible (for example, when the Load event occurs), the buttons are disabled.
trans-unit.target: 如果你设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enabled%2A>到`false`后<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>可见 （例如，在负载事件发生时），则禁用此按钮。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a new instance of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> and calls the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ShowDialog%2A> method to display the form as a dialog box.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例创建的新实例<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>和调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ShowDialog%2A>窗体显示为对话框中的方法。

trans-unit.source: The example sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormBorderStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.AcceptButton%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.CancelButton%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.MinimizeBox%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.MaximizeBox%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.StartPosition%2A> properties to change the appearance and functionality of the form to a dialog box.
trans-unit.target: 该示例设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormBorderStyle%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.AcceptButton%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.CancelButton%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.MinimizeBox%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.MaximizeBox%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.StartPosition%2A>属性来更改到对话框的外观和表单的功能。

trans-unit.source: The example also uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ControlCollection.Add%2A> method of the form's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Controls%2A> collection to add two <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> controls.
trans-unit.target: 此示例还使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ControlCollection.Add%2A>方法的窗体的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Controls%2A>集合来添加两个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>控件。

trans-unit.source: The example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.HelpButton%2A> property to display a help button in the caption bar of the dialog box.
trans-unit.target: 该示例使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.HelpButton%2A>属性对话框中的标题栏中显示帮助按钮。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Form" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Form" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The default size of a form is 300 pixels in height and 300 pixels in width.
trans-unit.target: 窗体的默认大小为 300 像素高度和宽度的 300 像素。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a new instance of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> and calls the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ShowDialog%2A> method to display the form as a dialog box.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例创建的新实例<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>和调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ShowDialog%2A>窗体显示为对话框中的方法。

trans-unit.source: The example sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormBorderStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.AcceptButton%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.CancelButton%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.MinimizeBox%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.MaximizeBox%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.StartPosition%2A> properties to change the appearance and functionality of the form to a dialog box.
trans-unit.target: 该示例设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormBorderStyle%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.AcceptButton%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.CancelButton%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.MinimizeBox%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.MaximizeBox%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.StartPosition%2A>属性来更改到对话框的外观和表单的功能。

trans-unit.source: The example also sets uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ControlCollection.Add%2A> method of the form's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Controls%2A> collection to add two <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> controls.
trans-unit.target: 该示例还将使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ControlCollection.Add%2A>方法的窗体的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Controls%2A>集合来添加两个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>控件。

trans-unit.source: The example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.HelpButton%2A> property to display a help button in the caption bar of the dialog box.
trans-unit.target: 该示例使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.HelpButton%2A>属性对话框中的标题栏中显示帮助按钮。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the button on the form that is clicked when the user presses the ENTER key.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置当用户按 Enter 键时所单击的窗体上的按钮。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.IButtonControl" /> that represents the button to use as the accept button for the form.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.IButtonControl" />，表示要用作窗体的“接受”按钮的按钮。

trans-unit.source: This property enables you to designate a default action to occur when the user presses the ENTER key in your application.
trans-unit.target: 此属性可指定用户在你的应用程序中按 ENTER 键时要发生的默认操作。

trans-unit.source: The button assigned to this property must be an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IButtonControl> that is on the current form or located within a container on the current form.
trans-unit.target: 必须是分配给此属性的按钮<xref:System.Windows.Forms.IButtonControl>当前窗体上或位于当前窗体上的容器。

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to allow the user to quickly navigate a simple form by allowing them to simply press the ENTER key when they are finished instead of manually clicking the accept button with their mouse.
trans-unit.target: 此属性可用于允许用户能够快速导航是允许他们只需按 ENTER 键，而不是手动单击用鼠标接受按钮完成时的一种简单形式。

trans-unit.source: The accept button might not be activated if the currently selected control on the form intercepts the ENTER key and processes it.
trans-unit.target: 如果窗体上的当前所选的控件截获 ENTER 键，并处理它，可能未激活接受按钮。

trans-unit.source: For example, a multiline text box control allows the ENTER key to be pressed when it is selected to insert a new line character in the control.
trans-unit.target: 例如，多行文本框控件允许选择要在控件中插入新行字符时按 ENTER 键。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a new instance of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> and calls the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ShowDialog%2A> method to display the form as a dialog box.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例创建的新实例<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>和调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ShowDialog%2A>窗体显示为对话框中的方法。

trans-unit.source: The example sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormBorderStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.AcceptButton%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.CancelButton%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.MinimizeBox%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.MaximizeBox%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.StartPosition%2A> properties to change the appearance and functionality of the form to a dialog box.
trans-unit.target: 该示例设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormBorderStyle%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.AcceptButton%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.CancelButton%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.MinimizeBox%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.MaximizeBox%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.StartPosition%2A>属性来更改到对话框的外观和表单的功能。

trans-unit.source: The example also uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ControlCollection.Add%2A> method of the form's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Controls%2A> collection to add two <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> controls.
trans-unit.target: 此示例还使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ControlCollection.Add%2A>方法的窗体的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Controls%2A>集合来添加两个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>控件。

trans-unit.source: The example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.HelpButton%2A> property to display a help button in the caption bar of the dialog box.
trans-unit.target: 该示例使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.HelpButton%2A>属性对话框中的标题栏中显示帮助按钮。

trans-unit.source: Activates the form and gives it focus.
trans-unit.target: 激活窗体并给予它焦点。

trans-unit.source: Activating a form brings it to the front if this is the active application, or it flashes the window caption if this is not the active application.
trans-unit.target: 激活窗体将它置于顶层如果这是活动的应用程序，或如果这不是活动的应用程序，它会闪烁窗口标题。

trans-unit.source: The form must be visible for this method to have any effect.
trans-unit.target: 该窗体必须可见才能产生任何影响此方法。

trans-unit.source: To determine the active form in an application, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ActiveForm%2A> property or the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ActiveMdiChild%2A> property if your forms are in a Multiple-document interface (MDI) application.
trans-unit.target: 若要确定活动窗体应用程序中的，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ActiveForm%2A>属性或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ActiveMdiChild%2A>如果窗体中的多文档界面 (MDI) 应用程序的属性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.SetDesktopLocation%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Activate%2A> members.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.SetDesktopLocation%2A>，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Activate%2A>成员。

trans-unit.source: To run the example, paste the following code in a form called `Form1` containing a button called `Button1` and two `Label` controls called `Label1` and `Label2`.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行该示例，请将以下代码粘贴在窗体调用`Form1`包含一个按钮调用`Button1`和两个`Label`控件称为`Label1`和`Label2`。

trans-unit.source: for changing focus.
trans-unit.target: 用于更改焦点。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionWindow.AllWindows" />.
trans-unit.target: 关联枚举：<see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionWindow.AllWindows" />。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the form is activated in code or by the user.
trans-unit.target: 当使用代码激活或用户激活窗体时发生。

trans-unit.source: When the application is active and has multiple forms, the active form is the form with the input focus.
trans-unit.target: 当应用程序处于活动状态，并且具有多个窗体时，活动窗体是具有输入焦点的窗体。

trans-unit.source: A form that is not visible cannot be the active form.
trans-unit.target: 不可见的窗体不能为活动窗体。

trans-unit.source: The simplest way to activate a visible form is to click it or use an appropriate keyboard combination.
trans-unit.target: 激活可见的窗体的最简单方法是单击它或使用相应的键盘组合。

trans-unit.source: To activate a form at run time using code, call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Activate%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要在运行时使用代码激活窗体，调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Activate%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: You can use this event for tasks such as updating the contents of the form based on changes made to the form's data when the form was not activated.
trans-unit.target: 例如，更新基于未激活窗体时对窗体的数据所做的更改窗体的内容的任务，你可以使用此事件。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.SetDesktopLocation%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Closed>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Activated>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Activate%2A> members.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.SetDesktopLocation%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Closed>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Activated>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Activate%2A>成员。

trans-unit.source: To run the example, paste the following code in a form called Form1 containing a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> called `Button1` and two <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Label> controls called `Label1` and `Label2`.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行该示例，请将以下代码粘贴一种称为 form1 包含<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>调用`Button1`和两个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Label>控件称为`Label1`和`Label2`。

trans-unit.source: The child form to activate.
trans-unit.target: 要激活的子窗体。

trans-unit.source: Activates the MDI child of a form.
trans-unit.target: 激活窗体的 MDI 子级。

trans-unit.source: If the `form` parameter is already the active MDI child form, then the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ActivateMdiChild%2A> method simply returns.
trans-unit.target: 如果`form`参数已经是活动的 MDI 子窗体，则<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ActivateMdiChild%2A>方法只返回。

trans-unit.source: If `form` is not `null`, then it is set to be the active MDI child form.
trans-unit.target: 如果`form`不`null`，则设置为活动的 MDI 子窗体。

trans-unit.source: Whether the `form` parameter is `null` or not, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ActivateMdiChild%2A> raises the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.MdiChildActivate> event.
trans-unit.target: 是否`form`参数是`null`，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ActivateMdiChild%2A>引发<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.MdiChildActivate>事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the currently active form for this application.
trans-unit.target: 获取此应用程序的当前活动窗体。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Form" /> that represents the currently active form, or <see langword="null" /> if there is no active form.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Form" />，表示当前活动窗体，或者如果没有活动窗体，则为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: You can use this method to obtain a reference to the currently active form to perform actions on the form or its controls.
trans-unit.target: 此方法可用于获取对当前活动窗体在窗体或其控件上执行操作的引用。

trans-unit.source: If your application is a multiple-document interface (MDI) application, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ActiveMdiChild%2A> property to obtain the currently active MDI child form.
trans-unit.target: 如果你的应用程序的多文档界面 (MDI) 应用程序，请使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ActiveMdiChild%2A>属性来获取当前处于活动状态的 MDI 子窗体。

trans-unit.source: The following code example gets the active form and disables all the controls on the form.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例获取活动窗体，并禁用窗体上的所有控件。

trans-unit.source: The example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Controls%2A> collection of the form to iterate through each control on the form and disable the controls.
trans-unit.target: 该示例使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Controls%2A>要循环访问每个窗体上的控件并禁用这些控件的窗体的集合。

trans-unit.source: for requesting a form.
trans-unit.target: 用于请求窗体。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionWindow.AllWindows" />.
trans-unit.target: 关联枚举：<see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionWindow.AllWindows" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the currently active multiple-document interface (MDI) child window.
trans-unit.target: 获取当前活动的多文档界面 (MDI) 子窗口。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Form" /> that represents the currently active MDI child window, or <see langword="null" /> if there are currently no child windows present.
trans-unit.target: 返回表示当前活动的 MDI 子窗口的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Form" />，或者如果当前没有子窗口，则返回 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: You can use this method to determine whether there are any MDI child forms open in your MDI application.
trans-unit.target: 此方法可用于确定是否有任何 MDI 子窗体在 MDI 应用程序中打开。

trans-unit.source: You can also use this method to perform operations on an MDI child window from its MDI parent form or from another form that is displayed in your application.
trans-unit.target: 此方法还可用于执行操作的 MDI 子窗口上，从其 MDI 父窗体或显示在你的应用程序的另一种形式。

trans-unit.source: If the currently active form is not an MDI child form, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ActiveForm%2A> property to obtain a reference to it.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前活动窗体不是 MDI 子窗体，则可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ActiveForm%2A>属性来获取对它的引用。

trans-unit.source: The following code example obtains a reference to the active MDI child form and loops through all <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> controls on the form, resetting their <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.Text%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例获取对活动的 MDI 子窗体，并循环访问所有的引用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>控件在表单上的重置其<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.Text%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: This example requires that an MDI parent form has been created and that this method call is being made from the MDI parent form.
trans-unit.target: 此示例需要已创建了一个 MDI 父窗体和此方法调用，正在从 MDI 父窗体进行。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Form" /> that this form will own.
trans-unit.target: 此窗体将拥有的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Form" />。

trans-unit.source: Adds an owned form to this form.
trans-unit.target: 向此窗体添加附属窗体。

trans-unit.source: The form assigned to the owner form remains owned until the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.RemoveOwnedForm%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: 分配给所有者窗体的窗体将保持被拥有直到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.RemoveOwnedForm%2A>调用方法。

trans-unit.source: You can also make a form owned by another by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Owner%2A> property with a reference to its owner form.
trans-unit.target: 你还可以通过设置拥有的另一个窗体<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Owner%2A>与对其所有者窗体的引用的属性。

trans-unit.source: When a form is owned by another form, it is closed or hidden with the owner form.
trans-unit.target: 当窗体拥有的另一种形式时，它被关闭或隐藏与所有者窗体。

trans-unit.source: For example, consider a form named `Form2` that is owned by a form named `Form1`.
trans-unit.target: 例如，考虑名为窗体`Form2`归名为窗体`Form1`。

trans-unit.source: If `Form1` is closed or minimized, `Form2` is also closed or hidden.
trans-unit.target: 如果`Form1`关闭或最小化，`Form2`也会关闭或隐藏。

trans-unit.source: Owned forms are also never displayed behind their owner form.
trans-unit.target: 附属窗体还永远不会显示在其所有者的窗体后面。

trans-unit.source: You can use owned forms for windows such as find and replace windows, which should not be displayed behind the owner form when the owner form is selected.
trans-unit.target: 可以拥有的窗体以 windows 使用如查找和替换 windows，不应在选择所有者窗体时显示在所有者窗体。

trans-unit.source: If the form is a multiple-document interface (MDI) parent form, this property returns all forms that are displayed with the exception of any MDI child forms that are currently open.
trans-unit.target: 如果窗体是多文档界面 (MDI) 父窗体，此属性返回当前任何 MDI 子窗体除了显示的所有窗体打开。

trans-unit.source: To obtain the MDI child forms opened in an MDI parent form, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.MdiChildren%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要获取在 MDI 父窗体中打开的 MDI 子窗体，请使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.MdiChildren%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.AddOwnedForm%2A> method to display a form as an owned form of another form.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.AddOwnedForm%2A>窗体显示为另一个窗体的附属窗体的方法。

trans-unit.source: Once the owned form is shown, you can minimize its owner form and the owned form will minimize with it.
trans-unit.target: 附属窗体显示后，你可以尽量减小其所有者窗体和附属窗体将与其最小化。

trans-unit.source: The example requires that the code in the example is called from another event or method of a form.
trans-unit.target: 该示例需要示例中的代码从另一个事件或窗体的方法调用。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to show the scroll bars; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果显示滚动条，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Adjusts the scroll bars on the container based on the current control positions and the control currently selected.
trans-unit.target: 根据当前控件位置和当前所选控件调整容器中的滚动条。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the opacity of the form can be adjusted.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示能否调整窗体的不透明度。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the opacity of the form can be changed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果可以更改窗体的不透明度，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This property is automatically set to `true` if the `Opacity` is changed.
trans-unit.target: 此属性自动设置为`true`如果`Opacity`更改。

trans-unit.source: When the opacity of a form is set using the `Opacity` property, the form will layer objects on the form.
trans-unit.target: 当使用设置窗体的不透明度`Opacity`属性，该窗体将窗体上的对象进行分层。

trans-unit.source: If you set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.AllowTransparency%2A> property to `false` the form will not be in layered mode which will improve the display performance of the form.
trans-unit.target: 如果你设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.AllowTransparency%2A>属性`false`窗体不会在分层的模式下，这将提高窗体显示性能。

trans-unit.source: Resizes the form according to the current value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Form.AutoScaleBaseSize" /> property and the size of the current font.
trans-unit.target: 根据 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Form.AutoScaleBaseSize" /> 属性的当前值和当前字体的大小来调整窗体大小。

trans-unit.source: This method determines the form size using the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.AutoScaleBaseSize%2A> property and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Size%2A> value returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.GetAutoScaleSize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 此方法可确定使用的值的窗体大小<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.AutoScaleBaseSize%2A>属性和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Size%2A>返回值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.GetAutoScaleSize%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the form adjusts its size to fit the height of the font used on the form and scales its controls.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示窗体是否调整其大小以适合该窗体上使用的字体高度，以及是否缩放其控件。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the form will automatically scale itself and its controls based on the current font assigned to the form; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果窗体根据分配给它的当前字体自动缩放本身及其控件，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则，为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.AutoScale%2A> is obsolete and has been retained for backward compatibility.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.AutoScale%2A>已过时，并已保留用于向后兼容。

trans-unit.source: The non-obsolete alternative is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContainerControl.AutoScaleMode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 未过时的替代项为 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContainerControl.AutoScaleMode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: For more information about automatic scaling, see [Automatic Scaling in Windows Forms](~/docs/framework/winforms/automatic-scaling-in-windows-forms.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关自动缩放的详细信息，请参阅[Windows 窗体中的自动缩放](~/docs/framework/winforms/automatic-scaling-in-windows-forms.md)。

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to allow your form and its controls to automatically adjust based on changes in the font.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用此属性以允许你的窗体，并为自动调整其控件基于的字体中的更改。

trans-unit.source: This can be useful in applications where the font might increase or decrease based on the language specified for use by Windows.
trans-unit.target: 这可在应用程序字体其中可能会增加或减少基于由 Windows 为使用指定的语言。

trans-unit.source: To obtain the size the form will auto scale to, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.AutoScaleBaseSize%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 以获取要使用比例的窗体将自动的大小<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.AutoScaleBaseSize%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: If you want to determine the size the form will auto scale to based on a specific font, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.GetAutoScaleSize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想要确定大小窗体将自动调整为根据特定的字体，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.GetAutoScaleSize%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the base size used for autoscaling of the form.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用于自动缩放窗体的基大小。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> that represents the base size that this form uses for autoscaling.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" />，表示此窗体用于自动缩放的基大小。

trans-unit.source: This member has been retained for backward compatibility.
trans-unit.target: 此成员已保留用于向后兼容。

trans-unit.source: For more information about automatic scaling, see [Automatic Scaling in Windows Forms](~/docs/framework/winforms/automatic-scaling-in-windows-forms.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关自动缩放的详细信息，请参阅[Windows 窗体中的自动缩放](~/docs/framework/winforms/automatic-scaling-in-windows-forms.md)。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.AutoScaleBaseSize%2A> property is used at form-display time to compute the scaling factor for the form.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.AutoScaleBaseSize%2A>属性用于在窗体显示时计算窗体的缩放因子。

trans-unit.source: The autoscaling base size is used by the form as a baseline for comparison to the system's font size to determine how much to scale the form when autoscaling is used.
trans-unit.target: 自动缩放基大小用于由窗体作为基准比较到系统的字体大小来确定多少使用自动缩放时缩放窗体。

trans-unit.source: If you want to determine the size a form will auto scale to based on a specific font, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.GetAutoScaleSize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想要确定大小窗体将自动调整为根据特定的字体，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.GetAutoScaleSize%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is used when the form is initially created.
trans-unit.target: 最初创建窗体时，使用此属性的值。

trans-unit.source: Once the property is set, it cannot be changed.
trans-unit.target: 一旦设置该属性，它不能更改。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the form enables autoscrolling.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示窗体是否启用自动滚动。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to enable autoscrolling on the form; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 若要在窗体上启用自动滚动，为 <see langword="true" />；否则，为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: If this property is set to `true`, scroll bars are displayed on the form if any controls are located outside the form's client region.
trans-unit.target: 如果此属性设置为`true`，如果任何控件位于窗体的客户端区域外窗体上显示滚动条。

trans-unit.source: Additionally, when autoscrolling is on, the client area of the form automatically scrolls to make the control with input focus visible.
trans-unit.target: 此外，当自动滚动时，窗体的工作区自动滚动，以使具有输入焦点的控件可见。

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to prevent users from losing the ability to view controls when their video resolution settings are set to a low resolution.
trans-unit.target: 此属性可用于防止用户会失去其视频分辨率设置被设置为较低的分辨率时查看控件的能力。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.AutoScroll%2A> property to enable the display of controls that are outsize the client area of a form.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.AutoScroll%2A>属性以支持超出窗体的工作区的控件的显示。

trans-unit.source: The example creates a new form and adds a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> control to the form.
trans-unit.target: 该示例创建一个新窗体并添加<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>到窗体控件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> control is positioned outsize the client area of the new form.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>控件是超出新窗体的工作区。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.AutoScroll%2A> property is set to true to display scroll bars on the form to enable the user to scroll to the control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.AutoScroll%2A>属性设置为 true，以在要使用户能够向下滚动到控件的窗体上显示滚动条。

trans-unit.source: This example requires that the method defined in this example is called from another form in an event handler or other method.
trans-unit.target: 此示例需要在此示例中定义方法从另一种形式的事件处理程序或其他方法中调用。

trans-unit.source: Resize the form according to the setting of <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Form.AutoSizeMode" />.
trans-unit.target: 根据 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Form.AutoSizeMode" /> 的设置调整窗体的大小。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the form will automatically resize; <see langword="false" /> if it must be manually resized.
trans-unit.target: 如果窗体将自动调整大小，则为 <see langword="true" />；如果必须手动调整大小，则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.AutoSize%2A> to force a form to resize to fit its contents.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.AutoSize%2A>可以强制窗体，若要调整大小以适应其内容。

trans-unit.source: A form does not automatically resize in the Visual Studio forms designer, regardless of the values of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.AutoSize%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.AutoSizeMode%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 窗体不会自动调整大小，在 Visual Studio 窗体设计器中，而不考虑的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.AutoSize%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.AutoSizeMode%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The form correctly resizes itself at run time according to the values of these two properties.
trans-unit.target: 窗体正确调整自身大小在运行时根据这两个属性的值。

trans-unit.source: By contrast, a custom <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UserControl> automatically resizes itself both at design time and at run time.
trans-unit.target: 与之相反，自定义<xref:System.Windows.Forms.UserControl>自动调整自身大小在设计时和运行时。

trans-unit.source: When using <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.AutoSize%2A>, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MinimumSize%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MaximumSize%2A> properties are respected, but the current value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A> property is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 使用时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.AutoSize%2A>、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MinimumSize%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MaximumSize%2A>遵循属性，但的当前值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A>忽略属性。

trans-unit.source: Using <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.AutoSize%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.AutoSizeMode%2A> also renders the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.AutoScroll%2A> property superfluous, as there is no way to shrink the form to hide its contained controls from view.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.AutoSize%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.AutoSizeMode%2A>还会呈现<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.AutoScroll%2A>多余的因为没有无法收缩要隐藏视图从其所含的控件的窗体的属性。

trans-unit.source: See the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode> enumeration for information on how a form behaves when <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.AutoSize%2A> is `true`.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode>有关窗体行为时的方式的信息的枚举<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.AutoSize%2A>是`true`。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows a form created using code that automatically resizes to fit its contents.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示使用自动调整大小以适应其内容的代码创建的窗体。

trans-unit.source: When run, the form displays a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Label>, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> for entering a URL, and a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> for displaying that URL inside of the user's default Web browser.
trans-unit.target: 当运行时，窗体显示<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Label>、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>用于输入 URL，和一个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>用于显示用户的默认 Web 浏览器内的该 URL。

trans-unit.source: The code example uses a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlowLayoutPanel> to lay out the contained controls one after the other.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlowLayoutPanel>进行布局所包含控制一个接一个。

trans-unit.source: It also sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AutoSize%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode> to grow and shrink to fit the contents of its form.
trans-unit.target: 它还将设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AutoSize%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode>增加和缩小以适合其窗体的内容。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Form.AutoSize" /> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 当 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Form.AutoSize" /> 属性更改时发生。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the mode by which the form automatically resizes itself.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置窗体自动调整自身大小的模式。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode" /> enumerated value.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode" /> 枚举值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode.GrowOnly" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode.GrowOnly" />。

trans-unit.source: Setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.AutoSizeMode%2A> property to a new value causes the form to be laid out again.
trans-unit.target: 设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.AutoSizeMode%2A>属性的新值会导致要再次布局的窗体。

trans-unit.source: A form does not automatically resize in the Visual Studio forms designer, regardless of the values of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.AutoSize%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.AutoSizeMode%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 窗体不会自动调整大小，在 Visual Studio 窗体设计器中，而不考虑的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.AutoSize%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.AutoSizeMode%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The form correctly resizes itself at run time according to the values of these two properties.
trans-unit.target: 窗体正确调整自身大小在运行时根据这两个属性的值。

trans-unit.source: By contrast, a custom <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UserControl> automatically resizes itself both at design time and at run time.
trans-unit.target: 与之相反，自定义<xref:System.Windows.Forms.UserControl>自动调整自身大小在设计时和运行时。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows a form created using code that automatically resizes to fit its contents.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示使用自动调整大小以适应其内容的代码创建的窗体。

trans-unit.source: When run, the form displaya a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Label>, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> for entering a URL, and a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> for displaying that URL inside of the user's default Web browser.
trans-unit.target: 当运行时，窗体将显示<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Label>、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>用于输入 URL，和一个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>用于显示用户的默认 Web 浏览器内的该 URL。

trans-unit.source: The code example uses a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlowLayoutPanel> to lay out the contained controls one after the other.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlowLayoutPanel>进行布局所包含控制一个接一个。

trans-unit.source: It also sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AutoSize%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode> to grow and shrink to fit the contents of its form.
trans-unit.target: 它还将设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AutoSize%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode>增加和缩小以适合其窗体的内容。

trans-unit.source: The value is not a valid <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode" /> value.
trans-unit.target: 该值不是有效的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether controls in this container will be automatically validated when the focus changes.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示当焦点更改时是否自动验证此容器内的控件。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AutoValidate" /> enumerated value that indicates whether contained controls are implicitly validated on focus change.
trans-unit.target: 指示焦点更改时是否隐式验证所含控件的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AutoValidate" /> 枚举值。

trans-unit.source: The default is Inherit.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为“继承”。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Form.AutoValidate" /> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 当 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Form.AutoValidate" /> 属性更改时发生。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the background color for the control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置控件的背景色。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> that represents the background color of the control.
trans-unit.target: 表示控件背景色的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DefaultBackColor" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 默认为 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DefaultBackColor" /> 属性的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the button control that is clicked when the user presses the ESC key.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置当用户按 Esc 键时单击的按钮控件。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.IButtonControl" /> that represents the cancel button for the form.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.IButtonControl" />，表示窗体的“取消”按钮。

trans-unit.source: The cancel button for a form is the button control that is clicked whenever the user presses the ESC key.
trans-unit.target: 窗体取消按钮是每当用户按下 ESC 键时单击该按钮控件。

trans-unit.source: The button assigned to this property must be an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IButtonControl> that is on the current form or located within a container on the current form.
trans-unit.target: 必须是分配给此属性的按钮<xref:System.Windows.Forms.IButtonControl>当前窗体上或位于当前窗体上的容器。

trans-unit.source: This property allows you to designate a default action to occur when the user presses the ESC key in your application.
trans-unit.target: 此属性，可指定用户在你的应用程序中按 ESC 键时要发生的默认操作。

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to allow the user to quickly navigate a simple form by allowing them to simply press the ESC key to close a window without committing changes instead of manually clicking the cancel button with their mouse.
trans-unit.target: 此属性可用于允许用户能够快速导航是允许他们只需按 ESC 键关闭窗口而不提交更改而不是手动单击取消按钮，用鼠标的一种简单形式。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.CancelButton%2A> may not work if another control on the form intercepts the ESC key.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.CancelButton%2A> 可能无法工作如果窗体上的另一个控件截获 ESC 键。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you have a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> open on your form, ESC will close the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> instead of closing the Form.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果你有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>打开窗体上，将关闭 ESC<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>而不是关闭窗体。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IButtonControl> object assigned to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.CancelButton%2A> must be visible on the form, or else pressing the ESC key will have no effect.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IButtonControl>对象分配给<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.CancelButton%2A>必须在表单上可见，否则是按下 ESC 键将产生任何影响。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a new instance of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> and calls the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ShowDialog%2A> method to display the form as a dialog box.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例创建的新实例<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>和调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ShowDialog%2A>窗体显示为对话框中的方法。

trans-unit.source: The example sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormBorderStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.AcceptButton%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.CancelButton%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.MinimizeBox%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.MaximizeBox%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.StartPosition%2A> properties to change the appearance and functionality of the form to a dialog box.
trans-unit.target: 该示例设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormBorderStyle%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.AcceptButton%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.CancelButton%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.MinimizeBox%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.MaximizeBox%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.StartPosition%2A>属性来更改到对话框的外观和表单的功能。

trans-unit.source: The example also uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ControlCollection.Add%2A> method of the form's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Controls%2A> collection to add two <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> controls.
trans-unit.target: 此示例还使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ControlCollection.Add%2A>方法的窗体的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Controls%2A>集合来添加两个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>控件。

trans-unit.source: The example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.HelpButton%2A> property to display a help button in the caption bar of the dialog box.
trans-unit.target: 该示例使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.HelpButton%2A>属性对话框中的标题栏中显示帮助按钮。

trans-unit.source: Centers the position of the form within the bounds of the parent form.
trans-unit.target: 使窗体在父窗体边界内居中。

trans-unit.source: Do not call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.CenterToParent%2A> method directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: 不要调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.CenterToParent%2A>在代码中直接的方法。

trans-unit.source: Instead, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.StartPosition%2A> property to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FormStartPosition.CenterParent>.
trans-unit.target: 与此相反，设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.StartPosition%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.FormStartPosition.CenterParent>。

trans-unit.source: If the form or dialog is top-level, then <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.CenterToParent%2A> centers the form with respect to the screen or desktop.
trans-unit.target: 如果窗体或对话框为顶级，则<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.CenterToParent%2A>中心相对于屏幕或桌面上窗体。

trans-unit.source: Centers the form on the current screen.
trans-unit.target: 使窗体在当前屏幕上居中。

trans-unit.source: Do not call this directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: 请勿在代码中直接调用此。

trans-unit.source: Instead, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.StartPosition%2A> property to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FormStartPosition.CenterScreen>.
trans-unit.target: 与此相反，设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.StartPosition%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.FormStartPosition.CenterScreen>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.CenterToScreen%2A> method uses the following priority list to determine the screen used to center the form:
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.CenterToScreen%2A>方法使用下面的优先级列表以确定用于中心窗体的屏幕：

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Owner%2A> property of the form.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Owner%2A>窗体的属性。

trans-unit.source: The HWND owner of the form.
trans-unit.target: 窗体 HWND 所有者。

trans-unit.source: The screen that currently has the mouse cursor.
trans-unit.target: 屏幕当前具有鼠标光标。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the size of the client area of the form.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置窗体工作区的大小。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> that represents the size of the form's client area.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" />，表示窗体工作区的大小。

trans-unit.source: The size of the client area of the form is the size of the form excluding the borders and the title bar.
trans-unit.target: 窗体的工作区的大小是不包括边框和标题栏的窗体的大小。

trans-unit.source: The client area of a form is the area within a form where controls can be placed.
trans-unit.target: 窗体的工作区是可在其中放置控件在窗体区域。

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to get the proper dimensions when performing graphics operations or when sizing and positioning controls on the form.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用此属性来获取正确的尺寸时执行图形操作或大小和位置表单上的控件时。

trans-unit.source: To get the size of the entire form, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Size%2A> property or use the individual properties <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要获取整个窗体的大小，请使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Size%2A>属性或使用的各个属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A>。

trans-unit.source: You cannot currently bind to this property using application settings.
trans-unit.target: 当前无法绑定到使用应用程序设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: For more information on application settings, see [Application Settings Overview](~/docs/framework/winforms/advanced/application-settings-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 应用程序设置的详细信息，请参阅[应用程序设置概述](~/docs/framework/winforms/advanced/application-settings-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates an event handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Resize> event of a form.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例创建的事件处理程序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Resize>窗体的事件。

trans-unit.source: The event handler uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ClientSize%2A> property of the form to make a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> control named `button1` fill the entire client area of the form.
trans-unit.target: 事件处理程序使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ClientSize%2A>属性的窗体，以<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>控件名为`button1`填充整个客户端区域的窗体。

trans-unit.source: Closes the form.
trans-unit.target: 关闭窗体。

trans-unit.source: When a form is closed, all resources created within the object are closed and the form is disposed.
trans-unit.target: 关闭窗体时，在该对象内创建的所有资源都关闭和释放该窗体。

trans-unit.source: You can prevent the closing of a form at run time by handling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Closing> event and setting the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs> passed as a parameter to your event handler.
trans-unit.target: 你可以通过处理来防止在运行时关闭窗体<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Closing>事件，并设置<xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>属性<xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs>作为参数传递给事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: If the form you are closing is the startup form of your application, your application ends.
trans-unit.target: 如果你在关闭窗体是你的应用程序启动窗体，你的应用程序结束。

trans-unit.source: The two conditions when a form is not disposed on `Close` is when (1) it is part of a multiple-document interface (MDI) application, and the form is not visible; and (2) you have displayed the form using <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ShowDialog%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 以下两种情况时窗体不会被释放上`Close`当 （1） 它是一个多文档界面 (MDI) 应用程序的一部分和窗体不可见，则和 （2） 你具有显示窗体使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ShowDialog%2A>。

trans-unit.source: In these cases, you will need to call <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Dispose%2A> manually to mark all of the form's controls for garbage collection.
trans-unit.target: 在这些情况下，你将需要调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Dispose%2A>手动来标记的所有垃圾回收的窗体的控件。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Close%2A> method is called on a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> displayed as a modeless window, you cannot call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Show%2A> method to make the form visible, because the form's resources have already been released.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Close%2A>方法调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>显示为一个无模式窗口，则不能调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Show%2A>方法，以使表单可见，因为已释放了窗体的资源。

trans-unit.source: To hide a form and then make it visible, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Hide%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要隐藏窗体，然后将其可见，请使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Hide%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: Prior to the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 2.0, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Closed?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Closing?displayProperty=nameWithType> events are not raised when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.Exit%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method is called to exit your application.
trans-unit.target: 之前[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]2.0，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Closed?displayProperty=nameWithType>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Closing?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件不是时引发<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.Exit%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>调用方法以退出应用程序。

trans-unit.source: If you have validation code in either of these events that must be executed, you should call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Close%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method for each open form individually before calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.Exit%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果你有在上述任一事件，必须执行的验证代码，则应调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Close%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>单独之前调用每个打开的窗体的方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.Exit%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The form was closed while a handle was being created.
trans-unit.target: 在创建句柄时关闭了窗体。

trans-unit.source: You cannot call this method from the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Activated" /> event when <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Form.WindowState" /> is set to <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.FormWindowState.Maximized" />.
trans-unit.target: 当 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Activated" /> 设置为 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Form.WindowState" /> 时，无法从 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.FormWindowState.Maximized" /> 事件调用此方法。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the form is closed.
trans-unit.target: 关闭窗体时发生。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Closed> event is obsolete in the .NET Framework version 2.0; use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosed> event instead.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Closed>事件是.NET Framework 2.0 版中过时的; 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosed>事件相反。

trans-unit.source: This event occurs after the form has been closed by the user or by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Close%2A> method of the form.
trans-unit.target: 由用户或通过关闭窗体后，将发生此事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Close%2A>形式的方法。

trans-unit.source: To prevent a form from closing, handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Closing> event and set the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs> passed to your event handler to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要阻止关闭窗体，处理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Closing>事件并设置<xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>属性<xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs>传递给事件处理程序`true`。

trans-unit.source: You can use this event to perform tasks such as freeing resources used by the form and to save information entered in the form or to update its parent form.
trans-unit.target: 若要执行任务，如释放资源由窗体和保存在窗体中输入信息或更新其父窗体，你可以使用此事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Closed?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Closing?displayProperty=nameWithType> events are not raised when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.Exit%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method is called to exit your application.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Closed?displayProperty=nameWithType>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Closing?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件不是时引发<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.Exit%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>调用方法以退出应用程序。

trans-unit.source: If you have validation code in either of these events that must be executed, you should call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Close%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method for each open form individually before calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.Exit%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果你有在上述任一事件，必须执行的验证代码，则应调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Close%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>单独之前调用每个打开的窗体的方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.Exit%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: If the form is an MDI parent form, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Closing> events of all MDI child forms are raised before the MDI parent form's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Closing> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 如果窗体是 MDI 父窗体，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Closing>所有 MDI 子窗体的事件引发 MDI 父窗体的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Closing>引发事件。

trans-unit.source: In addition, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Closed> events of all MDI child forms are raised before the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Closed> event of the MDI parent form is raised.
trans-unit.target: 此外，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Closed>之前，将引发事件的所有 MDI 子窗体<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Closed>引发 MDI 父窗体的事件。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.SetDesktopLocation%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Closed>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Activated>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Activate%2A> members.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.SetDesktopLocation%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Closed>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Activated>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Activate%2A>成员。

trans-unit.source: To run the example, paste the following code in a form called `Form1` containing a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> called `Button1` and two <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Label> controls called `Label1` and `Label2`.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行该示例，请将以下代码粘贴在窗体调用`Form1`包含<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>调用`Button1`和两个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Label>控件称为`Label1`和`Label2`。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the form is closing.
trans-unit.target: 关闭窗体时发生。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Closing> event is obsolete in the .NET Framework version 2.0; use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosing> event instead.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Closing>事件是.NET Framework 2.0 版中过时的; 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosing>事件相反。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Closing> event occurs as the form is being closed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Closing>事件发生，因为正在关闭窗体。

trans-unit.source: When a form is closed, all resources created within the object are released and the form is disposed.
trans-unit.target: 关闭窗体时，释放所有资源，在该对象内创建和释放该窗体。

trans-unit.source: If you cancel this event, the form remains opened.
trans-unit.target: 如果您取消此事件，该窗体保持打开状态。

trans-unit.source: To cancel the closure of a form, set the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs> passed to your event handler to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要取消窗体的关闭，<xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>属性<xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs>传递给事件处理程序`true`。

trans-unit.source: When a form is displayed as a modal dialog box, clicking the **Close** button (the button with an X at the upper-right corner of the form) causes the form to be hidden and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.DialogResult%2A> property to be set to `DialogResult.Cancel`.
trans-unit.target: 当窗体显示为模式对话框中时，单击**关闭**按钮 （带有窗体的右上角的 X 按钮） 将导致要隐藏的窗体和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.DialogResult%2A>属性设置为`DialogResult.Cancel`。

trans-unit.source: You can override the value assigned to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.DialogResult%2A> property when the user clicks the **Close** button by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.DialogResult%2A> property in an event handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Closing> event of the form.
trans-unit.target: 你可以重写的值分配给<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.DialogResult%2A>属性，当用户单击**关闭**通过设置按钮<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.DialogResult%2A>的事件处理程序中的属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Closing>窗体的事件。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Close%2A> method is called on a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> displayed as a modeless window, you cannot call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Show%2A> method to make the form visible, because the form's resources have already been released.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Close%2A>方法调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>显示为一个无模式窗口，则不能调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Show%2A>方法，以使表单可见，因为已释放了窗体的资源。

trans-unit.source: To hide a form and then make it visible, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Hide%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要隐藏窗体，然后将其可见，请使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Hide%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Closed?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Closing?displayProperty=nameWithType> events are not raised when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.Exit%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method is called to exit your application.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Closed?displayProperty=nameWithType>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Closing?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件不是时引发<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.Exit%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>调用方法以退出应用程序。

trans-unit.source: If you have validation code in either of these events that must be executed, you should call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Close%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method for each open form individually before calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.Exit%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果你有在上述任一事件，必须执行的验证代码，则应调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Close%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>单独之前调用每个打开的窗体的方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.Exit%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: If the form is an MDI parent form, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Closing> events of all MDI child forms are raised before the MDI parent form's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Closing> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 如果窗体是 MDI 父窗体，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Closing>所有 MDI 子窗体的事件引发 MDI 父窗体的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Closing>引发事件。

trans-unit.source: In addition, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Closed> events of all MDI child forms are raised before the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Closed> event of the MDI parent form is raised.
trans-unit.target: 此外，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Closed>之前，将引发事件的所有 MDI 子窗体<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Closed>引发 MDI 父窗体的事件。

trans-unit.source: Canceling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Closing> event of an MDI child form does not prevent the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Closing> event of the MDI parent form from being raised.
trans-unit.target: 取消<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Closing>的 MDI 子窗体的事件不会阻止<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Closing>引发 MDI 父窗体的事件。

trans-unit.source: However, canceling the event will set to `true` the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs> that is passed as a parameter to the parent form.
trans-unit.target: 但是，取消该事件将设置为`true`<xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>属性<xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs>，作为参数传递到父窗体。

trans-unit.source: To force all MDI parent and child forms to close, set the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property to `false` in the MDI parent form.
trans-unit.target: 若要强制所有 MDI 父和子窗体关闭，设置<xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>属性`false`在 MDI 父窗体。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Closing> to test if the text in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> has changed.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Closing>以测试是否中的文本<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>已更改。

trans-unit.source: If it has, the user is asked whether to save the changes to a file.
trans-unit.target: 如果具有，则要求用户是否将所做的更改保存到文件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether a control box is displayed in the caption bar of the form.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示在该窗体的标题栏中是否显示控件框。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the form displays a control box in the upper-right corner of the form; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 如果窗体的窗体，则右上角显示控件框否则为<see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ControlBox%2A> property is set to `true`, the control box is displayed in the upper-right corner of the caption bar.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ControlBox%2A>属性设置为`true`中的标题栏的右上角显示控件框。

trans-unit.source: The control box can include minimize, maximize, and help buttons in addition to a close button.
trans-unit.target: 控件框可以包含最小化、 最大化，并帮助此外关闭按钮的按钮。

trans-unit.source: For the `ControlBox` property to have any effect, you must also set the form's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormBorderStyle%2A> property to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FormBorderStyle.FixedSingle?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FormBorderStyle.Sizable?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FormBorderStyle.Fixed3D?displayProperty=nameWithType>, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FormBorderStyle.FixedDialog?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 有关`ControlBox`属性产生任何影响，还必须设置窗体的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormBorderStyle%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.FormBorderStyle.FixedSingle?displayProperty=nameWithType>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FormBorderStyle.Sizable?displayProperty=nameWithType>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FormBorderStyle.Fixed3D?displayProperty=nameWithType>，或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.FormBorderStyle.FixedDialog?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: If you set <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ControlBox%2A> to `false` and also set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Location%2A> property, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Size%2A> property of the form is not updated to reflect that the non-client area of the form has been hidden.
trans-unit.target: 如果你设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ControlBox%2A>到`false`并且还设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Location%2A>属性，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Size%2A>窗体的属性未更新以反映该窗体的非工作区已被隐藏。

trans-unit.source: To fix this problem, put the code that alters the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Location%2A> property in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.HandleCreated> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 若要解决此问题，请将更改的代码放<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Location%2A>中的属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.HandleCreated>事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: When set to `false`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ControlBox%2A> property has no effect on a Multiple-document interface (MDI) child form that is displayed maximized at time of creation.
trans-unit.target: 当设置为`false`、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ControlBox%2A>属性不起作用创建时最大化显示多文档界面 (MDI) 子窗体上的。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ControlBox%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormBorderStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.MaximizeBox%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.MinimizeBox%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.StartPosition%2A> properties to create a form that does not have any border or caption box.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ControlBox%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormBorderStyle%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.MaximizeBox%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.MinimizeBox%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.StartPosition%2A>属性创建不具有任何边框或标题中的窗体。

trans-unit.source: The form created in this example could be used to create a splash screen for an application.
trans-unit.target: 在此示例中创建的窗体无法用于创建应用程序的初始屏幕。

trans-unit.source: The example requires that the example's method is defined in a form class and called when the form is being initialized.
trans-unit.target: 该示例需要示例的方法是在窗体类中定义并在初始化窗体时调用。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the control collection for the control.
trans-unit.target: 为控件创建控件集合的新实例。

trans-unit.source: A new instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection" /> assigned to the control.
trans-unit.target: 分配给控件的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection" /> 的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Creates the handle for the form.
trans-unit.target: 为窗体创建句柄。

trans-unit.source: If a derived class overrides this function, it must call the base implementation.
trans-unit.target: 如果派生类重写了该函数，它必须调用基实现。

trans-unit.source: A handle for this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Form" /> has already been created.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Form" /> 的句柄已创建。

trans-unit.source: Gets the required creation parameters when the control handle is created.
trans-unit.target: 获取创建控件句柄时所需要的创建参数。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams" /> that contains the required creation parameters when the handle to the control is created.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams" />，包含创建控件的句柄时所需的创建参数。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the form loses focus and is no longer the active form.
trans-unit.target: 当窗体失去焦点并不再是活动窗体时发生。

trans-unit.source: You can use this event to perform tasks such as updating another window in your application with data from the deactivated form.
trans-unit.target: 此事件可用于执行任务，例如已停用窗体中的数据更新应用程序中的另一个窗口。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Deactivate> event.
trans-unit.target: 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Deactivate>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>与<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或追加到一个多行消息<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> named `Form1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>名为`Form1`。

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Deactivate> event.
trans-unit.target: 然后，确保与事件处理程序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Deactivate>事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the default Input Method Editor (IME) mode supported by the control.
trans-unit.target: 获取控件支持的默认输入法编辑器 (IME) 模式。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: An input method editor (IME) is a program that allows users to enter complex characters and symbols, such as Japanese Kanji characters, by using a standard keyboard.
trans-unit.target: 输入的法编辑器 (IME) 是一个程序，允许用户通过使用标准键盘输入复杂字符和符号，如日语汉字字符。

trans-unit.source: As implemented in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> class, this property always returns the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode.NoControl?displayProperty=nameWithType> value.
trans-unit.target: 在中实现<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>类，此属性始终返回<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode.NoControl?displayProperty=nameWithType>值。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is assigned to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ImeMode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的值分配给<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ImeMode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets the default size of the control.
trans-unit.target: 获取控件的默认大小。

trans-unit.source: The default <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> of the control.
trans-unit.target: 控件的默认 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" />。

trans-unit.source: The Windows <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Message" /> to process.
trans-unit.target: 要处理的 Windows <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Message" />。

trans-unit.source: Sends the specified message to the default window procedure.
trans-unit.target: 向默认窗口过程发送指定消息。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the size and location of the form on the Windows desktop.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 Windows 桌面上窗体的大小和位置。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> that represents the bounds of the form on the Windows desktop using desktop coordinates.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" />，它使用桌面坐标表示 Windows 桌面上窗体的边界。

trans-unit.source: Desktop coordinates are based on the working area of the screen, which excludes the taskbar.
trans-unit.target: 桌面坐标相对于屏幕，其中不包括任务栏的工作区域。

trans-unit.source: The coordinate system of the desktop is pixel-based.
trans-unit.target: 桌面坐标系统是基于像素的。

trans-unit.source: If your application is running on a multiple monitor system, the coordinates of the form are the coordinates for the combined desktop.
trans-unit.target: 如果你的应用程序正在运行的多个监视器系统上，在窗体坐标是合并后的桌面的坐标。

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to size and position a form relative to other forms or applications on the Windows desktop.
trans-unit.target: 此属性可用于调整大小和在 Windows 桌面上的位置相对于其他窗体或应用程序的窗体。

trans-unit.source: The following code example sets the size and position of a form so that the form is positioned 50 pixels from the left border of the desktop and 50 pixels from the top of the desktop.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例设置的大小和窗体的位置，以便该窗体是定位 50 像素，距左边框的顶部的桌面的桌面版和 50 像素。

trans-unit.source: This example requires that the method is defined within a form class.
trans-unit.target: 此示例需要在窗体类中定义方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the location of the form on the Windows desktop.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 Windows 桌面上窗体的位置。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> that represents the location of the form on the desktop.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" />，表示桌面上窗体的位置。

trans-unit.source: Desktop coordinates are based on the working area of the screen, which excludes the taskbar.
trans-unit.target: 桌面坐标相对于屏幕，其中不包括任务栏的工作区域。

trans-unit.source: The coordinate system of the desktop is pixel based.
trans-unit.target: 桌面坐标系统是基于像素。

trans-unit.source: If your application is running on a multimonitor system, the coordinates of the form are the coordinates for the combined desktop.
trans-unit.target: 如果你的应用程序正在运行的多监视器系统上，在窗体的坐标为合并后的桌面的坐标。

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to position your form relative to other forms and applications on the Windows desktop.
trans-unit.target: 此属性可用于在 Windows 桌面上的位置相对于其他窗体和应用程序窗体。

trans-unit.source: If you call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.SetDesktopLocation%2A> method before calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Show%2A> method, your form will be positioned at its default location, which is determined by the operating system.
trans-unit.target: 如果调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.SetDesktopLocation%2A>方法之前调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Show%2A>方法，将在其默认位置，它由系统定位你的窗体。

trans-unit.source: For more information about window positioning, see the "Window Size and Position" section of the "Window Features" document in the MSDN library at http://msdn.microsoft.com/library.
trans-unit.target: 有关窗口定位的详细信息，请参阅在 MSDN 库中的"窗口功能"文档"窗口大小和位置"部分http://msdn.microsoft.com/library。

trans-unit.source: If you call <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.SetDesktopLocation%2A> after calling <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Show%2A>, your form will be positioned at the location you specified.
trans-unit.target: 如果调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.SetDesktopLocation%2A>之后调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Show%2A>，你的窗体将位于你指定的位置。

trans-unit.source: The following code example sets the position of a form so that the form is positioned 100 pixels from the left border of the desktop and 100 pixels from the top of the desktop.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例设置窗体的位置，以便窗体为定位的 100 个像素，距左边框的顶部的桌面的桌面和 100 个像素。

trans-unit.source: This example requires that method has been defined within a form class.
trans-unit.target: 此示例需要已在窗体类中定义的方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the dialog result for the form.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置窗体的对话框结果。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DialogResult" /> that represents the result of the form when used as a dialog box.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DialogResult" />，表示当窗体用作对话框时该窗体的结果。

trans-unit.source: The dialog result of a form is the value that is returned from the form when it is displayed as a modal dialog box.
trans-unit.target: 窗体的对话框结果是它显示为模式对话框时，从窗体返回的值。

trans-unit.source: If the form is displayed as a dialog box, setting this property with a value from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DialogResult> enumeration sets the value of the dialog box result for the form, hides the modal dialog box, and returns control to the calling form.
trans-unit.target: 如果该窗体显示为对话框中，设置此属性的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DialogResult>枚举设置窗体的对话框结果的值，隐藏模式对话框，并将控制权返回给调用窗体。

trans-unit.source: This property is typically set by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button.DialogResult%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> control on the form.
trans-unit.target: 此属性通常由设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button.DialogResult%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>窗体上的控件。

trans-unit.source: When the user clicks the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> control, the value assigned to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button.DialogResult%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> is assigned to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.DialogResult%2A> property of the form.
trans-unit.target: 当用户单击<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>控制分配给值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button.DialogResult%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>分配给<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.DialogResult%2A>窗体的属性。

trans-unit.source: When a form is displayed as a modal dialog box, clicking the **Close** button (the button with an X in the top-right corner of the form) causes the form to be hidden and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.DialogResult%2A> property to be set to `DialogResult.Cancel`.
trans-unit.target: 当窗体显示为模式对话框中时，单击**关闭**按钮 （带有中窗体的右上角的 X 按钮） 将导致要隐藏的窗体和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.DialogResult%2A>属性设置为`DialogResult.Cancel`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Close%2A> method is not automatically called when the user clicks the **Close** button of a dialog box or sets the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.DialogResult%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Close%2A>方法时不会自动调用用户单击**关闭**按钮的对话框中设置的值或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.DialogResult%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Instead, the form is hidden and can be shown again without creating a new instance of the dialog box.
trans-unit.target: 相反，窗体区域不可用，可以再次显示而无需创建对话框中的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Because of this behavior, you must call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Dispose%2A> method of the form when the form is no longer needed by your application.
trans-unit.target: 由于此行为，必须调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Dispose%2A>时窗体应用程序不再需要该窗体的方法。

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to determine how a dialog box is closed in order to properly process the actions performed in the dialog box.
trans-unit.target: 此属性可用于确定如何将对话框中关闭以便正确处理在对话框中执行的操作。
