trans-unit.source: You can override the value assigned to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.DialogResult%2A> property when the user clicks the **Close** button by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.DialogResult%2A> property in an event handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Closing> event of the form.
trans-unit.target: 你可以重写的值分配给<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.DialogResult%2A>属性，当用户单击**关闭**通过设置按钮<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.DialogResult%2A>的事件处理程序中的属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Closing>窗体的事件。

trans-unit.source: If a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> is displayed as a modeless window, the value returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.DialogResult%2A> property might not return a value assigned to the form because the form's resources are automatically released when the form is closed.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>显示无模式窗口中，返回的值为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.DialogResult%2A>属性可能不返回值分配给窗体，因为关闭窗体时自动释放窗体的资源。

trans-unit.source: The following code example displays a form as a dialog box and displays a message box indicating whether the OK or Cancel button of the form was clicked by referencing the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.DialogResult%2A> property of the form.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例将窗体显示为对话框中，并显示消息框，该值指示是否通过引用被单击的窗体的确定或取消按钮<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.DialogResult%2A>窗体的属性。

trans-unit.source: The value specified is outside the range of valid values.
trans-unit.target: 指定值不在有效值范围内。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <see langword="false" /> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: 若要释放托管资源和非托管资源，则为 <see langword="true" />；若仅释放非托管资源，则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Disposes of the resources (other than memory) used by the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Form" />.
trans-unit.target: 处置由 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Form" /> 占用的资源（内存除外）。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose` method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 此方法称为由公共`Dispose`方法和<xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: `Dispose` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose` 调用受保护`Dispose(Boolean)`方法替换`disposing`参数设置为`true`。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> 调用`Dispose`与`disposing`设置为`false`。

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> references.
trans-unit.target: 当 `disposing` 参数为 `true` 时，此方法释放该 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> 引用的、由任何托管对象持有的全部资源。

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: 此方法调用每个引用对象的 `Dispose` 方法。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Dispose%2A> will be called automatically if the form is shown using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Show%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Dispose%2A> 如果使用显示窗体将自动调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Show%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: If another method such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ShowDialog%2A> is used, or the form is never shown at all, you must call <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Dispose%2A> yourself within your application.
trans-unit.target: 如果另一种方法，如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ShowDialog%2A>使用时，或根本永远不会显示窗体，则必须调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Dispose%2A>中你的应用程序。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="Dispose" /> can be called multiple times by other objects.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="Dispose" /> 可以由其他对象多次调用。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />, be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to <see langword="Dispose" />.
trans-unit.target: 重写 <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" /> 时，请注意不要引用在以前调用 <see langword="Dispose" /> 时已释放的对象。

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to implement <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />, see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关如何实现详细信息<see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />，请参阅[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

trans-unit.source: For more information about <see langword="Dispose" /> and <see cref="M:System.Object.Finalize" />, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息<see langword="Dispose" />和<see cref="M:System.Object.Finalize" />，请参阅[清洗向上非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[重写 Finalize 方法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3)。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the DPI setting changes on the display device where the form is currently displayed.
trans-unit.target: 当前显示窗体的显示设备上的 DPI 设置更改时发生。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the border style of the form.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置窗体的边框样式。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.FormBorderStyle" /> that represents the style of border to display for the form.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.FormBorderStyle" />，表示要为窗体显示的边框样式。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="FormBorderStyle.Sizable" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="FormBorderStyle.Sizable" />。

trans-unit.source: The border style of the form determines how the outer edge of the form appears.
trans-unit.target: 窗体的边框样式确定的外边缘的窗体的显示方式。

trans-unit.source: In addition to changing the border display for a form, certain border styles prevent the form from being sized.
trans-unit.target: 除了更改窗体的边框显示，某些边框样式阻止窗体的大小。

trans-unit.source: For example, the `FormBorderStyle.FixedDialog` border style changes the border of the form to that of a dialog box and prevents the form from being resized.
trans-unit.target: 例如，`FormBorderStyle.FixedDialog`边框样式更改为的对话框中的窗体的边框，并阻止窗体在正调整大小。

trans-unit.source: The border style can also affect the size or availability of the caption bar section of a form.
trans-unit.target: 大小或窗体的标题栏区域的可用性，还会影响的边框样式。

trans-unit.source: With the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FormBorderStyle.Sizable> style, it is impossible to resize the window below a certain minimum value, even if you have set <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ControlBox%2A> to `false` and assigned a zero-length string to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Text%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 与<xref:System.Windows.Forms.FormBorderStyle.Sizable>样式，就是无法调整大小窗口下面某些最小值，即使已设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ControlBox%2A>到`false`并分配到一个零长度字符串<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Text%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Consider working around this by using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FormBorderStyle.SizableToolWindow> style instead.
trans-unit.target: 请解决这考虑通过使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.FormBorderStyle.SizableToolWindow>改为样式。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a new instance of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> and calls the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ShowDialog%2A> method to display the form as a dialog box.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例创建的新实例<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>和调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ShowDialog%2A>窗体显示为对话框中的方法。

trans-unit.source: The example sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormBorderStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.AcceptButton%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.CancelButton%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.MinimizeBox%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.MaximizeBox%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.StartPosition%2A> properties to change the appearance and functionality of the form to a dialog box.
trans-unit.target: 该示例设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormBorderStyle%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.AcceptButton%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.CancelButton%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.MinimizeBox%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.MaximizeBox%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.StartPosition%2A>属性来更改到对话框的外观和表单的功能。

trans-unit.source: The example also uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ControlCollection.Add%2A> method of the form's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Controls%2A> collection to add two <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> controls.
trans-unit.target: 此示例还使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ControlCollection.Add%2A>方法的窗体的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Controls%2A>集合来添加两个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>控件。

trans-unit.source: The example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.HelpButton%2A> property to display a help button in the caption bar of the dialog box.
trans-unit.target: 该示例使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.HelpButton%2A>属性对话框中的标题栏中显示帮助按钮。

trans-unit.source: The value specified is outside the range of valid values.
trans-unit.target: 指定值不在有效值范围内。

trans-unit.source: Occurs after the form is closed.
trans-unit.target: 关闭窗体后发生。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosed> event occurs after the form has been closed by the user or by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Close%2A> method or the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.Exit%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosed>事件发生在由用户或通过关闭窗体之后<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Close%2A>方法或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.Exit%2A>方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application>类。

trans-unit.source: To prevent a form from closing, handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosing> event and set the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs> passed to your event handler to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要阻止关闭窗体，处理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosing>事件并设置<xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>属性<xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs>传递给事件处理程序`true`。

trans-unit.source: You can use this event to perform tasks such as freeing resources used by the form and to save information entered in the form or to update its parent form.
trans-unit.target: 若要执行任务，如释放资源由窗体和保存在窗体中输入信息或更新其父窗体，你可以使用此事件。

trans-unit.source: If the form is a multiple-document interface (MDI) parent form, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosing> events of all MDI child forms are raised before the MDI parent form's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosing> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 如果窗体是多文档界面 (MDI) 父窗体，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosing>所有 MDI 子窗体的事件引发 MDI 父窗体的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosing>引发事件。

trans-unit.source: Likewise, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosed> events of all MDI child forms are raised before the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosed> event of the MDI parent form is raised.
trans-unit.target: 同样，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosed>之前，将引发事件的所有 MDI 子窗体<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosed>引发 MDI 父窗体的事件。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosed> event.
trans-unit.target: 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosed>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>与<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或追加到一个多行消息<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> named `Form1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>名为`Form1`。

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosed> event.
trans-unit.target: 然后，确保与事件处理程序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosed>事件。

trans-unit.source: Occurs before the form is closed.
trans-unit.target: 关闭窗体前发生。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosing> event occurs as the form is being closed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosing>事件发生，因为正在关闭窗体。

trans-unit.source: When a form is closed, it is disposed, releasing all resources associated with the form.
trans-unit.target: 关闭窗体时，它将被释放，释放与表单关联的所有资源。

trans-unit.source: If you cancel this event, the form remains opened.
trans-unit.target: 如果您取消此事件，该窗体保持打开状态。

trans-unit.source: To cancel the closure of a form, set the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FormClosingEventArgs> passed to your event handler to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要取消窗体的关闭，<xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.FormClosingEventArgs>传递给事件处理程序`true`。

trans-unit.source: When a form is displayed as a modal dialog box, clicking the **Close** button (the button with an X at the upper-right corner of the form) causes the form to be hidden and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.DialogResult%2A> property to be set to `DialogResult.Cancel`.
trans-unit.target: 当窗体显示为模式对话框中时，单击**关闭**按钮 （带有窗体的右上角的 X 按钮） 将导致要隐藏的窗体和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.DialogResult%2A>属性设置为`DialogResult.Cancel`。

trans-unit.source: You can override the value assigned to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.DialogResult%2A> property when the user clicks the **Close** button by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.DialogResult%2A> property in an event handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosing> event of the form.
trans-unit.target: 你可以重写的值分配给<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.DialogResult%2A>属性，当用户单击**关闭**通过设置按钮<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.DialogResult%2A>的事件处理程序中的属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosing>窗体的事件。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Close%2A> method is called on a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> displayed as a modeless window, you cannot call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Show%2A> method to make the form visible, because the form's resources have already been released.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Close%2A>方法调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>显示为一个无模式窗口，则不能调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Show%2A>方法，以使表单可见，因为已释放了窗体的资源。

trans-unit.source: To hide a form and then make it visible, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Hide%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要隐藏窗体，然后将其可见，请使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Hide%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: If the form is a multiple-document interface (MDI) parent form, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosing> events of all MDI child forms are raised before the MDI parent form's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosing> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 如果窗体是多文档界面 (MDI) 父窗体，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosing>所有 MDI 子窗体的事件引发 MDI 父窗体的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosing>引发事件。

trans-unit.source: Likewise, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosed> events of all MDI child forms are raised before the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosed> event of the MDI parent form is raised.
trans-unit.target: 同样，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosed>之前，将引发事件的所有 MDI 子窗体<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosed>引发 MDI 父窗体的事件。

trans-unit.source: Canceling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosing> event of an MDI child form does not prevent the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosing> event of the MDI parent form from being raised.
trans-unit.target: 取消<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosing>的 MDI 子窗体的事件不会阻止<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosing>引发 MDI 父窗体的事件。

trans-unit.source: However, canceling the event will set to `true` the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FormClosingEventArgs> class that is passed as a parameter to the parent form.
trans-unit.target: 但是，取消该事件将设置为`true`<xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.FormClosingEventArgs>作为参数传递到父窗体的类。

trans-unit.source: To force all MDI parent and child forms to close, set the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property to `false` in the MDI parent form.
trans-unit.target: 若要强制所有 MDI 父和子窗体关闭，设置<xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>属性`false`在 MDI 父窗体。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosing> event.
trans-unit.target: 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosing>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>与<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或追加到一个多行消息<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> named `Form1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>名为`Form1`。

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosing> event.
trans-unit.target: 然后，确保与事件处理程序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosing>事件。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" /> representing the font to determine the autoscaled base size of the form.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" />，表示确定窗体的自动缩放基大小的字体。

trans-unit.source: Gets the size when autoscaling the form based on a specified font.
trans-unit.target: 获取根据指定的字体自动缩放窗体时的大小。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" /> representing the autoscaled size of the form.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" />，表示窗体的自动缩放大小。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.GetAutoScaleSize%2A> method is obsolete in.NET Framework version 2.0.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.GetAutoScaleSize%2A>方法是过时在.net Framework 2.0 版。

trans-unit.source: This member has been retained for backward compatibility.
trans-unit.target: 此成员已保留用于向后兼容。

trans-unit.source: For more information about automatic scaling, see [Automatic Scaling in Windows Forms](~/docs/framework/winforms/automatic-scaling-in-windows-forms.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关自动缩放的详细信息，请参阅[Windows 窗体中的自动缩放](~/docs/framework/winforms/automatic-scaling-in-windows-forms.md)。

trans-unit.source: You can use this method to determine the size a form would autoscale to for a specific font before applying the font to the form.
trans-unit.target: 此方法可用于确定窗体将字体应用于窗体之前将自动缩放到特定字体的大小。

trans-unit.source: If you want to determine the size a form is autoscaled to based on the font currently assigned to the form, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.AutoScaleBaseSize%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想要确定大小的形式是自动缩放到基于当前分配给窗体的字体，请使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.AutoScaleBaseSize%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> that specifies the area for which to retrieve the display bounds.
trans-unit.target: 指定要在显示器边界中检索的区域的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" />。

trans-unit.source: The height and width of the control's bounds.
trans-unit.target: 控件边界的高度和宽度。

trans-unit.source: One of the values of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified" /> that specifies the bounds of the control to use when defining its size and position.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified" /> 值之一，指定在定义控件大小和位置时要使用的控件边界。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the bounds within which the control is scaled.
trans-unit.target: 检索缩放控件时的边界。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> representing the bounds within which the control is scaled.
trans-unit.target: 一个表示控件缩放边界的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether a Help button should be displayed in the caption box of the form.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否应在窗体的标题框中显示“帮助”按钮。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to display a Help button in the form's caption bar; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 <see langword="true" />，则在窗体的标题栏中显示“帮助”按钮；否则，为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: When this property is set to `true`, a small button with a question mark appears in the caption bar to the left of the **Close** button.
trans-unit.target: 当此属性设置为`true`，问号的小按钮将出现在左侧的标题栏中**关闭**按钮。

trans-unit.source: You can use this button to display help for your application.
trans-unit.target: 此按钮可用于显示有关你的应用程序的帮助。

trans-unit.source: You can create an event handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.HelpRequested> event to display Help information to the user when the Help button of the form is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 你可以创建的事件处理程序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.HelpRequested>事件来单击的窗体帮助按钮时，向用户显示帮助信息。

trans-unit.source: To display a Help button, the value of the form's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ControlBox> property must be `true`, its default value.
trans-unit.target: 若要显示帮助按钮，窗体的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ControlBox>属性必须为`true`，其默认值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ControlBox> property determines whether the upper-right corner of the caption bar contains controls such as a maximize button, a minimize button, a help button, and a close button.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ControlBox>属性确定的标题栏的右上角是否包含如最大化按钮、 最小化按钮、 帮助按钮和关闭按钮的控件。

trans-unit.source: In addition, you must also set the form's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormBorderStyle%2A> property to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FormBorderStyle.FixedSingle?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FormBorderStyle.Sizable?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FormBorderStyle.Fixed3D?displayProperty=nameWithType>, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FormBorderStyle.FixedDialog?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 此外，还必须设置窗体的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormBorderStyle%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.FormBorderStyle.FixedSingle?displayProperty=nameWithType>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FormBorderStyle.Sizable?displayProperty=nameWithType>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FormBorderStyle.Fixed3D?displayProperty=nameWithType>，或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.FormBorderStyle.FixedDialog?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.HelpButton%2A> property is ignored if the **Maximize** or **Minimize** buttons are shown.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.HelpButton%2A>如果忽略属性**最大化**或**最小化**显示按钮。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a new instance of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> and calls the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ShowDialog%2A> method to display the form as a dialog box.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例创建的新实例<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>和调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ShowDialog%2A>窗体显示为对话框中的方法。

trans-unit.source: The example sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormBorderStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.AcceptButton%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.CancelButton%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.MinimizeBox%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.MaximizeBox%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.StartPosition%2A> properties to change the appearance and functionality of the form to a dialog box.
trans-unit.target: 该示例设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormBorderStyle%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.AcceptButton%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.CancelButton%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.MinimizeBox%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.MaximizeBox%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.StartPosition%2A>属性来更改到对话框的外观和表单的功能。

trans-unit.source: The example also uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ControlCollection.Add%2A> method of the form's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Controls%2A> collection to add two <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> controls.
trans-unit.target: 此示例还使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ControlCollection.Add%2A>方法的窗体的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Controls%2A>集合来添加两个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>控件。

trans-unit.source: The example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.HelpButton%2A> property to display a Help button in the caption bar of the dialog box.
trans-unit.target: 该示例使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.HelpButton%2A>属性对话框中的标题栏中显示帮助按钮。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the **Help** button is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 单击“帮助”按钮时发生。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.HelpButtonClicked> event occurs when the **Help** button in the form's caption bar is clicked.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.HelpButtonClicked>事件发生时**帮助**单击窗体的标题栏中的按钮。

trans-unit.source: The **Help** button is displayed when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.HelpButton%2A> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: **帮助**显示按钮时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.HelpButton%2A>属性设置为`true`。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.HelpButtonClicked> can be canceled.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.HelpButtonClicked> 可以取消。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.HelpButtonClicked> event.
trans-unit.target: 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.HelpButtonClicked>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>与<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或追加到一个多行消息<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> named `Form1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>名为`Form1`。

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.HelpButtonClicked> event.
trans-unit.target: 然后，确保与事件处理程序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.HelpButtonClicked>事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the icon for the form.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置窗体的图标。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Icon" /> that represents the icon for the form.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Icon" />，表示窗体的图标。

trans-unit.source: A form's icon designates the picture that represents the form in the taskbar as well as the icon that is displayed for the control box of the form.
trans-unit.target: 窗体的图标指定表示任务栏，以及此图标显示为在窗体控件框中的窗体中的图片。

trans-unit.source: This property will have no effect if <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormBorderStyle%2A> is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FormBorderStyle.FixedDialog>.
trans-unit.target: 此属性将产生任何影响，如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormBorderStyle%2A>设置为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.FormBorderStyle.FixedDialog>。

trans-unit.source: In that case, the form will not display an icon.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，窗体将不会显示一个图标。

trans-unit.source: Occurs after the input language of the form has changed.
trans-unit.target: 更改窗体的输入语言后发生。

trans-unit.source: You can use this event to make changes to your form's appearance and text based on changes made to the input language of the form.
trans-unit.target: 此事件可用于对表单的外观和基于窗体的输入语言所做的更改的文本进行更改。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.InputLanguageChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.InputLanguageChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>与<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或追加到一个多行消息<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> named `Form1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>名为`Form1`。

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.InputLanguageChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 然后，确保与事件处理程序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.InputLanguageChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user attempts to change the input language for the form.
trans-unit.target: 当用户尝试更改窗体的输入语言时发生。

trans-unit.source: This event occurs before the change of input language is made for the form.
trans-unit.target: 窗体进行的输入语言更改之前，将发生此事件。

trans-unit.source: You can cancel the language change by setting the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.InputLanguageChangingEventArgs> passed to your event handler to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 你可以通过设置取消语言更改<xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.InputLanguageChangingEventArgs>传递给事件处理程序`false`。

trans-unit.source: If the event is canceled, the input language is not changed.
trans-unit.target: 如果取消了该事件，不会更改输入的语言。

trans-unit.source: You can use this event to determine whether the requested input language change is appropriate for your application.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用此事件以确定请求的输入的语言更改是否适合你的应用程序。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.InputLanguageChanging> event.
trans-unit.target: 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.InputLanguageChanging>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>与<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或追加到一个多行消息<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> named `Form1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>名为`Form1`。

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.InputLanguageChanging> event.
trans-unit.target: 然后，确保与事件处理程序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.InputLanguageChanging>事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the form is a multiple-document interface (MDI) child form.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示窗体是否为多文档界面 (MDI) 子窗体。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the form is an MDI child form; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果该窗体是 MDI 子窗体，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则，为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: At run time, MDI child forms are displayed inside the client area of an MDI parent form.
trans-unit.target: 在运行时，MDI 子窗体将显示在一个 MDI 父窗体工作区。

trans-unit.source: An MDI child form can be maximized, minimized, and moved within the MDI parent form.
trans-unit.target: 可以最大化、 最小化，和 MDI 父窗体中移动的 MDI 子窗体。

trans-unit.source: To create an MDI child form, assign the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> that will be the MDI parent form to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.MdiParent%2A> property of the child form.
trans-unit.target: 若要创建的 MDI 子窗体，将分配<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>将到 MDI 父窗体<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.MdiParent%2A>子窗体的属性。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.IsMdiContainer%2A> property to determine whether a form is an MDI parent form.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.IsMdiContainer%2A>属性来确定窗体是 MDI 父窗体。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.IsMdiChild%2A> property to determine whether a form returned by a method or property is an MDI child form or a standard form in your application such as a dialog box.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.IsMdiChild%2A>属性来确定由方法或属性返回的窗体是 MDI 子窗体或在你的应用程序，如对话框中的标准窗体。

trans-unit.source: All MDI child forms have sizable borders, a control-menu box, and Minimize and **Maximize** buttons, regardless of the settings of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormBorderStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ControlBox%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.MinimizeBox%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.MaximizeBox%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 所有 MDI 子窗体都具有可调整大小的边框、 一个控件菜单框中和最小化和**最大化**按钮，而不考虑的设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormBorderStyle%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ControlBox%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.MinimizeBox%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.MaximizeBox%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the form is a container for multiple-document interface (MDI) child forms.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示窗体是否为多文档界面 (MDI) 子窗体的容器。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the form is a container for MDI child forms; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果该窗体是 MDI 子窗体的容器，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则，为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This property changes the display and behavior of the form to an MDI parent form.
trans-unit.target: 此属性更改为一个 MDI 父窗体的显示和行为的窗体。

trans-unit.source: When this property is set to `true`, the form displays a sunken client area with a raised border.
trans-unit.target: 当此属性设置为`true`，窗体显示具有凸起边框的凹陷工作区。

trans-unit.source: All MDI child forms assigned to the parent form are displayed within its client area.
trans-unit.target: 分配给父窗体的所有 MDI 子窗体将都显示在其工作区内。

trans-unit.source: When an MDI parent form is closed, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Closing> events of all MDI child forms are raised before the MDI parent form's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Closing> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 当关闭 MDI 父窗体时，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Closing>所有 MDI 子窗体的事件引发 MDI 父窗体的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Closing>引发事件。

trans-unit.source: In addition, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Closed> events of all MDI child forms are raised before the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Closed> event of the MDI parent form is raised.
trans-unit.target: 此外，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Closed>之前，将引发事件的所有 MDI 子窗体<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Closed>引发 MDI 父窗体的事件。

trans-unit.source: If there are two <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip> controls on an MDI child form, setting <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.IsMdiContainer%2A> to `true` for the parent form merges the contents of only one of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip> controls.
trans-unit.target: 如果有两个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>上设置的 MDI 子窗体的控件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.IsMdiContainer%2A>到`true`父窗体将只有其中一个的内容合并<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>控件。

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManager.Merge%2A> to merge the contents of additional child <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip> controls on the MDI parent form.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManager.Merge%2A>其他子的内容合并<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>MDI 父窗体上的控件。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.IsMdiContainer%2A> property as well as changing the `BackColor` property of an MDI Form.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.IsMdiContainer%2A>属性以及更改`BackColor`的 MDI 窗体的属性。

trans-unit.source: To run this example, paste the following code in a new form.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此示例，请在新的窗体中粘贴以下代码。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the form can use all windows and user input events without restriction.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示窗体是否可以不受限制地使用所有窗口和用户输入事件。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the form has restrictions; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果窗体有限制，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.IsRestrictedWindow%2A> property determines whether the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionWindow.AllWindows> permission is granted.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.IsRestrictedWindow%2A>属性确定是否<xref:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionWindow.AllWindows>授予权限。

trans-unit.source: This property is set at run time in the form's constructor, and is cached for the lifetime of the form.
trans-unit.target: 此属性设置在窗体的构造函数中的运行时，窗体的生存期内缓存。

trans-unit.source: Windows Forms applications running in partial trust cannot circumvent this check, as the common language runtime ensures that the parent constructor is always called in partial trust.
trans-unit.target: 在部分信任环境中运行的 Windows 窗体应用程序不能避开此检查，因为公共语言运行时可确保，在部分信任情况下始终调用父构造函数。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the form will receive key events before the event is passed to the control that has focus.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示在将键事件传递到具有焦点的控件前，窗体是否将接收此键事件。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the form will receive all key events; <see langword="false" /> if the currently selected control on the form receives key events.
trans-unit.target: 如果窗体将接收所有键事件，则为 <see langword="true" />；如果窗体上当前选定控件接收键事件，则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: When this property is set to `true`, the form will receive all <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyUp> events.
trans-unit.target: 当此属性设置为`true`，窗体将接收所有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyUp>事件。

trans-unit.source: After the form's event handlers have completed processing the keystroke, the keystroke is then assigned to the control with focus.
trans-unit.target: 窗体的事件处理程序已完成处理击键后，键击然后指派给具有焦点的控件。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.KeyPreview%2A> property is set to `true` and the currently selected control is a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>, after the keystroke is handled by the event handlers of the form the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control will receive the key that was pressed.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.KeyPreview%2A>属性设置为`true`和当前选择的控件是<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>之后由窗体的事件处理程序处理击键,<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>控件将接收已按下的键。

trans-unit.source: To handle keyboard events only at the form level and not allow controls to receive keyboard events, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyPressEventArgs.Handled%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property in your form's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress> event handler to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要仅在窗体级别处理键盘事件而不允许控件接收到键盘事件，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyPressEventArgs.Handled%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>中窗体的属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress>事件处理程序`true`。

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to process most keystrokes in your application and either handle the keystroke or call the appropriate control to handle the keystroke.
trans-unit.target: 此属性可用于处理大多数击键中你的应用程序并可以处理键击或调用来处理击键的相应控件。

trans-unit.source: For example, when an application uses function keys, you might want to process the keystrokes at the form level rather than writing code for each control that might receive keystroke events.
trans-unit.target: 例如，当应用程序使用功能键，你可能想要处理窗体级别，而不是为每个控件都可能会收到击键事件编写代码。

trans-unit.source: If a form has no visible or enabled controls, it automatically receives all keyboard events.
trans-unit.target: 如果窗体不具有任何可见或启用的控件，它会自动获得所有键盘事件。

trans-unit.source: A control on a form may be programmed to cancel any keystrokes it receives.
trans-unit.target: 窗体上的控件可能进行编程，从而取消它接收任何击键。

trans-unit.source: Since the control never sends these keystrokes to the form, the form will never see them regardless of the setting of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.KeyPreview%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 由于控件永远不会将这些击键发送到窗体，该窗体将不会看到它们不管如何设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.KeyPreview%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates setting a form's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.KeyPreview%2A> property to true and handling the key events at the form level.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何设置窗体的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.KeyPreview%2A>为 true，处理窗体级别的关键事件的属性。

trans-unit.source: To run the example, paste the following code in a blank form.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行该示例，请在空白的窗体中粘贴以下代码。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MdiLayout" /> values that defines the layout of MDI child forms.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MdiLayout" /> 值之一，定义 MDI 子窗体的布局。

trans-unit.source: Arranges the multiple-document interface (MDI) child forms within the MDI parent form.
trans-unit.target: 在 MDI 父窗体内排列多文档界面 (MDI) 子窗体。

trans-unit.source: You can use this method to arrange the MDI child forms in your MDI parent form to allow for easier navigation and manipulation of MDI child forms.
trans-unit.target: 此方法可用于在 MDI 父窗体，以便更轻松导航和操作的 MDI 子窗体中排列 MDI 子窗体。

trans-unit.source: MDI child forms can be tiled horizontally and vertically, cascaded, or as icons within the MDI parent form.
trans-unit.target: MDI 子窗体可以平铺水平和垂直，级联，或者显示为在 MDI 父窗体内的图标。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows the event handlers for the menu items of a Window menu in an MDI application's parent form.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示在 MDI 应用程序的父窗体的窗口菜单的菜单项的事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: Each event handler makes calls to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.LayoutMdi%2A> method to arrange any child forms that are currently open in the application.
trans-unit.target: 每个事件处理程序调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.LayoutMdi%2A>排列任何子窗体的方法是在应用程序中当前打开。

trans-unit.source: Occurs before a form is displayed for the first time.
trans-unit.target: 在第一次显示窗体前发生。

trans-unit.source: You can use this event to perform tasks such as allocating resources used by the form.
trans-unit.target: 此事件可用于执行任务，例如分配由窗体的资源。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.SetDesktopLocation%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Activated>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Activate%2A> members.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.SetDesktopLocation%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Activated>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Activate%2A>成员。

trans-unit.source: To run the example, paste the following code in a form called `Form1` containing a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> called `Button1` and two <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Label> controls called `Label1` and `Label2`.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行该示例，请将以下代码粘贴在窗体调用`Form1`包含<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>调用`Button1`和两个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Label>控件称为`Label1`和`Label2`。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> that represents the upper-left corner of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Form" /> in screen coordinates.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置以屏幕坐标表示的代表 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Form" /> 左上角的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> that represents the upper-left corner of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Form" /> in screen coordinates.
trans-unit.target: 以屏幕坐标表示的代表 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Form" /> 左上角的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" />。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.Point> is a structure, which means that it is a value type.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Point> 是一种结构，这意味着它是值类型。

trans-unit.source: If you access a property in <xref:System.Drawing.Point>, a copy of the property is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果访问中的属性<xref:System.Drawing.Point>，返回的属性的副本。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, changing the <xref:System.Drawing.Point.X%2A> or <xref:System.Drawing.Point.Y%2A> properties of the <xref:System.Drawing.Point> returned from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Location%2A> property will not affect the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Left%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Right%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Top%2A>, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Bottom%2A> property values of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>.
trans-unit.target: 因此，更改<xref:System.Drawing.Point.X%2A>或<xref:System.Drawing.Point.Y%2A>属性<xref:System.Drawing.Point>从返回<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Location%2A>属性将不会影响<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Left%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Right%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Top%2A>，或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Bottom%2A>属性值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>.

trans-unit.source: To adjust these properties, set each property value individually, or set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Location%2A> property with a new <xref:System.Drawing.Point>.
trans-unit.target: 若要调整这些属性，分别设置每个属性值，或设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Location%2A>为一个新的属性<xref:System.Drawing.Point>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Location%2A> property gets or sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Location%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> base class, and sets the <xref:System.ComponentModel.SettingsBindableAttribute.Bindable%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Location%2A>属性获取或设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Location%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>基类，并设置<xref:System.ComponentModel.SettingsBindableAttribute.Bindable%2A>属性`true`。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the primary menu container for the form.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置窗体的主菜单容器。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip" /> that represents the container for the menu structure of the form.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip" /> 表示窗体菜单结构的容器。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: In addition to setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.MainMenuStrip%2A> property, you must <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.Add%2A> the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip> control to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Controls%2A> collection of the form.
trans-unit.target: 除了设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.MainMenuStrip%2A>属性，你必须<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.Add%2A><xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>控制转移到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Controls%2A>窗体的集合。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip> class supersedes the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu> class in previous versions of the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>类取代<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>在以前版本的.NET Framework 的类。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the space between controls.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置控件之间的空间。

trans-unit.source: A value that represents the space between controls.
trans-unit.target: 表示控件之间的空间的值。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Margin" /> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 当 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Margin" /> 属性更改时发生。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the **Maximize** button is displayed in the caption bar of the form.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否在窗体的标题栏中显示“最大化”按钮。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to display a **Maximize** button for the form; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 若要显示**最大化**按钮窗体; 否则为<see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: A **Maximize** button enables users to enlarge a window to full-screen size.
trans-unit.target: A**最大化**按钮使用户得以扩大到全屏幕大小的窗口。

trans-unit.source: To display a **Maximize** button, the value of the form's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ControlBox> property must be `true`, its default value.
trans-unit.target: 若要显示**最大化**按钮的窗体的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ControlBox>属性必须为`true`，其默认值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ControlBox> property determines whether the upper-right corner of the caption bar contains controls such as a maximize button, a minimize button, a help button, and a close button.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ControlBox>属性确定的标题栏的右上角是否包含如最大化按钮、 最小化按钮、 帮助按钮和关闭按钮的控件。

trans-unit.source: In addition, you must also set the form's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormBorderStyle%2A> property to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FormBorderStyle.FixedSingle?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FormBorderStyle.Sizable?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FormBorderStyle.Fixed3D?displayProperty=nameWithType>, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FormBorderStyle.FixedDialog?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 此外，还必须设置窗体的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormBorderStyle%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.FormBorderStyle.FixedSingle?displayProperty=nameWithType>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FormBorderStyle.Sizable?displayProperty=nameWithType>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FormBorderStyle.Fixed3D?displayProperty=nameWithType>，或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.FormBorderStyle.FixedDialog?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: A **Maximize** button automatically becomes a restore button when a window is maximized.
trans-unit.target: A**最大化**按钮自动变成一个还原按钮最大化窗口时。

trans-unit.source: Minimizing or restoring a window automatically changes the restore button back to a **Maximize** button.
trans-unit.target: 最小化或还原窗口将自动更改还原按钮返回到**最大化**按钮。

trans-unit.source: Maximizing a form at run time generates a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Resize> event.
trans-unit.target: 在运行时将窗体最大程度地生成<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Resize>事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.WindowState%2A> property reflects the current state of the window.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.WindowState%2A>属性反映窗口的当前状态。

trans-unit.source: If you set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.WindowState%2A> property to `FormWindowState.Maximized`, the form is maximized independently of whatever settings are in effect for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.MaximizeBox%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormBorderStyle%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 如果你设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.WindowState%2A>属性`FormWindowState.Maximized`，窗体最大化独立于任何设置实际上适用于<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.MaximizeBox%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormBorderStyle%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a new instance of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> and calls the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ShowDialog%2A> method to display the form as a dialog box.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例创建的新实例<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>和调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ShowDialog%2A>窗体显示为对话框中的方法。

trans-unit.source: The example sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormBorderStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.AcceptButton%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.CancelButton%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.MinimizeBox%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.MaximizeBox%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.StartPosition%2A> properties to change the appearance and functionality of the form to a dialog box.
trans-unit.target: 该示例设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormBorderStyle%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.AcceptButton%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.CancelButton%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.MinimizeBox%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.MaximizeBox%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.StartPosition%2A>属性来更改到对话框的外观和表单的功能。

trans-unit.source: The example also uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ControlCollection.Add%2A> method of the form's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Controls%2A> collection to add two <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> controls.
trans-unit.target: 此示例还使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ControlCollection.Add%2A>方法的窗体的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Controls%2A>集合来添加两个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>控件。

trans-unit.source: The example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.HelpButton%2A> property to display a help button in the caption bar of the dialog box.
trans-unit.target: 该示例使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.HelpButton%2A>属性对话框中的标题栏中显示帮助按钮。

trans-unit.source: Gets and sets the size of the form when it is maximized.
trans-unit.target: 获取和设置窗体最大化后的大小。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> that represents the bounds of the form when it is maximized.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" />，表示窗体最大化后的边界。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Top" /> property is greater than the height of the form.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Top" /> 属性的值大于窗体的高度。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The value of the <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Left" /> property is greater than the width of the form.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Left" /> 属性的值大于窗体的宽度。

trans-unit.source: Classes that inherit from <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Form" /> can override this method to provide new bounds for the form when it is maximized.
trans-unit.target: 继承自的类<see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Form" />可以重写此方法，以最大化时窗体提供新边界。

trans-unit.source: The class sets this property internally when the form's **Maximize** button is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 类将此属性设置内部时窗体的**最大化**单击按钮。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Form.MaximizedBounds" /> property has changed.
trans-unit.target: 在 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Form.MaximizedBounds" /> 属性的值更改后发生。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.MaximizedBoundsChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.MaximizedBoundsChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>与<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或追加到一个多行消息<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> named `Form1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>名为`Form1`。

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.MaximizedBoundsChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 然后，确保与事件处理程序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.MaximizedBoundsChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the maximum size the form can be resized to.
trans-unit.target: 获取窗体可调整到的最大大小。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> that represents the maximum size for the form.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" />，表示该窗体的最大大小。

trans-unit.source: This property enables you to limit the size of a form to a specified maximum size.
trans-unit.target: 此属性可限制为指定的最大大小的窗体的大小。

trans-unit.source: You can use this feature when displaying multiple windows at the same time, to ensure that a single window does not cause other windows to be hidden.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用此功能，同时显示多个窗口时以确保单个窗口不会导致其他窗口来隐藏。

trans-unit.source: If this property is set to a <xref:System.Drawing.Size> object that is 0 in height and 0 in width, the form will have no maximum size beyond the limits set by Windows.
trans-unit.target: 如果此属性设置为<xref:System.Drawing.Size>是 0 高度和宽度，窗体中的为 0 的对象将具有由 Windows 设置的限制之外没有最大大小。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.MaximumSize%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示了如何设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.MaximumSize%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The values of the height or width within the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> object are less than zero.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> 对象内的高或宽的值小于零。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Form.MaximumSize" /> property has changed.
trans-unit.target: 在 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Form.MaximumSize" /> 属性的值更改后发生。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.MaximumSizeChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.MaximumSizeChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。

trans-unit.target: 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>与<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或追加到一个多行消息<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.target: 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>名为`Form1`。

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.MaximumSizeChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 然后，确保与事件处理程序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.MaximumSizeChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a multiple-document interface (MDI) child form is activated or closed within an MDI application.
trans-unit.target: 在多文档界面 (MDI) 应用程序内激活或关闭 MDI 子窗体时发生。

trans-unit.source: You can use this event to perform tasks such as updating the contents of the MDI child form and changing the menu options available in the MDI parent form based on the status of the MDI child form that is activated.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用此事件来执行任务，如更新 MDI 子窗体的内容和更改的菜单选项 MDI 父窗体中提供基于状态的已激活 MDI 子窗体。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.MdiChildActivate> event.
trans-unit.target: 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.MdiChildActivate>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
