trans-unit.target: 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>名为`Form1`。

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.MdiChildActivate> event.
trans-unit.target: 然后，确保与事件处理程序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.MdiChildActivate>事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets an array of forms that represent the multiple-document interface (MDI) child forms that are parented to this form.
trans-unit.target: 获取窗体的数组，这些窗体表示以此窗体作为父级的多文档界面 (MDI) 子窗体。

trans-unit.source: An array of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Form" /> objects, each of which identifies one of this form's MDI child forms.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Form" /> 对象的数组，每个对象都标识此窗体的一个 MDI 子窗体。

trans-unit.source: This property allows you to obtain references to all the MDI child forms currently opened in an MDI parent form.
trans-unit.target: 此属性，可获取对所有 MDI 子窗体在 MDI 父窗体中当前打开的引用。

trans-unit.source: To create an MDI child form, assign the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> that will be the MDI parent form to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.MdiParent%2A> property of the child form.
trans-unit.target: 若要创建的 MDI 子窗体，将分配<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>将到 MDI 父窗体<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.MdiParent%2A>子窗体的属性。

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to loop through all the MDI child forms to perform operations such as saving data to a database when the MDI parent form closes or to update fields on the child forms based on actions performed in your application.
trans-unit.target: 此属性可用于循环访问所有 MDI 子窗体来执行操作，例如将数据保存到数据库，MDI 父窗体关闭时或更新基于你的应用程序中执行的操作将子窗体上的字段。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.MdiChildren%2A> property to iterate through the list of MDI child forms and add a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> control to each.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.MdiChildren%2A>属性循环访问列表的 MDI 子窗体并添加<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>到每个控件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the current multiple-document interface (MDI) parent form of this form.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置此窗体的当前多文档界面 (MDI) 父窗体。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Form" /> that represents the MDI parent form.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Form" />，表示 MDI 父窗体。

trans-unit.source: To create an MDI child form, assign the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> that will be the MDI parent form to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.MdiParent%2A> property of the child form.
trans-unit.target: 若要创建的 MDI 子窗体，将分配<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>将到 MDI 父窗体<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.MdiParent%2A>子窗体的属性。

trans-unit.source: You can use this property from an MDI child form to obtain global information that all child forms need or to invoke methods that perform actions to all child forms.
trans-unit.target: 若要获取所有子窗体都需要的全局信息或调用执行所有子窗体的操作的方法，可以使用此属性从 MDI 子窗体。

trans-unit.source: If there are two <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip> controls on an MDI child form, setting <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.IsMdiContainer%2A> to `true` for the parent form merges the contents of only one of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip> controls.
trans-unit.target: 如果有两个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>上设置的 MDI 子窗体的控件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.IsMdiContainer%2A>到`true`父窗体将只有其中一个的内容合并<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>控件。

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManager.Merge%2A> to merge the contents of additional child <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip> controls on the MDI parent form.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManager.Merge%2A>其他子的内容合并<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>MDI 父窗体上的控件。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to create child forms in an MDI application.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何在 MDI 应用程序中创建子窗体。

trans-unit.source: The example code creates a form with unique text to identify the child form.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例创建具有唯一的文本，以标识的子窗体的窗体。

trans-unit.source: The example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.MdiParent%2A> property to specify that a form is a child form.
trans-unit.target: 该示例使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.MdiParent%2A>属性来指定窗体是子窗体。

trans-unit.source: This example requires that the code in the example is called from a form that has its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.IsMdiContainer%2A> property set to `true` and that the form has a private class level integer variable named `childCount`.
trans-unit.target: 此示例需要在示例中的代码称为从窗体具有其<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.IsMdiContainer%2A>属性设置为`true`和窗体具有一个名为的私有类级别的整型变量`childCount`。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Form" /> assigned to this property is not marked as an MDI container.
trans-unit.target: 分配给此属性的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Form" /> 没有被标记为 MDI 容器。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Form" /> assigned to this property is both a child and an MDI container form.
trans-unit.target: 分配给此属性的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Form" /> 同时作为子 MDI 窗体和 MDI 容器窗体。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Form" /> assigned to this property is located on a different thread.
trans-unit.target: 分配给此属性的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Form" /> 位于其他线程上。

trans-unit.source: for requesting a form.
trans-unit.target: 用于请求窗体。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionWindow.AllWindows" />.
trans-unit.target: 关联枚举：<see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionWindow.AllWindows" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu" /> that is displayed in the form.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置在窗体中显示的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu" /> that represents the menu to display in the form.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu" />，表示要在窗体中显示的菜单。

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to switch between complete menu sets at run time.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用此属性在运行时的整个菜单集合间进行切换。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can define one <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu> to be displayed when your multiple-document interface (MDI) form has no active MDI child forms and another <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu> to display when a child window is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 例如，你可以定义一个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>时多文档界面 (MDI) 窗体具有没有活动的 MDI 子窗体和另一个要显示<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>显示子窗口时显示。

trans-unit.source: You can also use a different <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu> when specific conditions exist in your application that require displaying a different menu set.
trans-unit.target: 你还可以使用不同<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>要求显示不同的菜单集的应用程序中存在特定条件时。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>, assigns two <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> objects to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu> and binds it to a form.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例创建<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>，将两个分配<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>对象添加到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>并将其绑定到窗体。

trans-unit.source: This example requires that you have a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> created that is named `Form1`.
trans-unit.target: 此示例要求你拥有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>创建命名为`Form1`。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the menu of a form loses focus.
trans-unit.target: 当窗体菜单失去焦点时发生。

trans-unit.source: This event is raised when you click on any menu item in a menu that results in a command being performed and the menu losing focus.
trans-unit.target: 当你单击菜单中的任何菜单项中正在执行的命令该结果和该菜单失去焦点时，引发此事件。

trans-unit.source: You can use this event to perform tasks such as updating the text of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control or enabling and disabling buttons on a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar>.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用此事件来执行任务，例如更新的文本<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>控件或上启用和禁用按钮<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar>。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.MenuComplete> event.
trans-unit.target: 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.MenuComplete>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>与<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或追加到一个多行消息<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> named `Form1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>名为`Form1`。

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.MenuComplete> event.
trans-unit.target: 然后，确保与事件处理程序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.MenuComplete>事件。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the menu of a form receives focus.
trans-unit.target: 当窗体菜单接收焦点时发生。

trans-unit.source: This event is raised when any menu item in the menu is clicked by the user.
trans-unit.target: 用户单击菜单中的任何菜单项时，引发此事件。

trans-unit.source: You can use this event to perform tasks such as enabling and disabling controls on the form that should not be accessed by the user when the menus are being accessed.
trans-unit.target: 此事件可用于执行任务，例如启用和禁用菜单在访问时不应由用户访问窗体上的控件。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.MenuStart> event.
trans-unit.target: 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.MenuStart>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>与<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或追加到一个多行消息<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> named `Form1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>名为`Form1`。

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.MenuStart> event.
trans-unit.target: 然后，确保与事件处理程序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.MenuStart>事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the merged menu for the form.
trans-unit.target: 获取窗体的合并菜单。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu" /> that represents the merged menu of the form.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu" />，表示窗体的合并菜单。

trans-unit.source: This property is primarily used when the form is a multiple-document interface (MDI) child form that merges its menu with its parent form's menu.
trans-unit.target: 在窗体合并了其父窗体的菜单的其菜单多文档界面 (MDI) 子窗体时，主要使用此属性。

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to obtain the current menu structure in an MDI application to make changes or additions to the menu structure.
trans-unit.target: 此属性可用于获取 MDI 应用程序以进行更改或元素添加到菜单结构中的当前菜单结构。

trans-unit.source: To obtain the nonmerged <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu> assigned to a form, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Menu%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要获取的未合并<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>分配给窗体，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Menu%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the **Minimize** button is displayed in the caption bar of the form.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否在窗体的标题栏中显示“最小化”按钮。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to display a **Minimize** button for the form; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 若要显示**最小化**按钮窗体; 否则为<see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: A **Minimize** button enables users to minimize a window to an icon.
trans-unit.target: A**最小化**按钮使用户得以最小化窗口图标。

trans-unit.source: To display a **Minimize** button, the value of the form's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ControlBox> property must be `true`, its default value.
trans-unit.target: 若要显示**最小化**按钮的窗体的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ControlBox>属性必须为`true`，其默认值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ControlBox> property determines whether the upper-right corner of the caption bar contains controls such as a maximize button, a minimize button, a help button, and a close button.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ControlBox>属性确定的标题栏的右上角是否包含如最大化按钮、 最小化按钮、 帮助按钮和关闭按钮的控件。

trans-unit.source: In addition, you must also set the form's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormBorderStyle%2A> property to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FormBorderStyle.FixedSingle?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FormBorderStyle.Sizable?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FormBorderStyle.Fixed3D?displayProperty=nameWithType>, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FormBorderStyle.FixedDialog?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 此外，还必须设置窗体的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormBorderStyle%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.FormBorderStyle.FixedSingle?displayProperty=nameWithType>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FormBorderStyle.Sizable?displayProperty=nameWithType>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FormBorderStyle.Fixed3D?displayProperty=nameWithType>，或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.FormBorderStyle.FixedDialog?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Minimizing a form at run time generates a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Resize> event.
trans-unit.target: 最小化窗体，在运行时生成<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Resize>事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.WindowState%2A> property reflects the current state of the window.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.WindowState%2A>属性反映窗口的当前状态。

trans-unit.source: If you set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.WindowState%2A> property to `FormWindowState.Minimized`, the form is minimized independently of whatever settings are in effect for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.MinimizeBox%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormBorderStyle%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 如果你设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.WindowState%2A>属性`FormWindowState.Minimized`，窗体将独立于任何设置实际上适用于最小化<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.MinimizeBox%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormBorderStyle%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a new instance of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> and calls the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ShowDialog%2A> method to display the form as a dialog box.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例创建的新实例<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>和调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ShowDialog%2A>窗体显示为对话框中的方法。

trans-unit.source: The example sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormBorderStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.AcceptButton%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.CancelButton%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.MinimizeBox%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.MaximizeBox%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.StartPosition%2A> properties to change the appearance and functionality of the form to a dialog box.
trans-unit.target: 该示例设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormBorderStyle%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.AcceptButton%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.CancelButton%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.MinimizeBox%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.MaximizeBox%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.StartPosition%2A>属性来更改到对话框的外观和表单的功能。

trans-unit.source: The example also uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ControlCollection.Add%2A> method of the form's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Controls%2A> collection to add two <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> controls.
trans-unit.target: 此示例还使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ControlCollection.Add%2A>方法的窗体的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Controls%2A>集合来添加两个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>控件。

trans-unit.source: The example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.HelpButton%2A> property to display a help button in the caption bar of the dialog box.
trans-unit.target: 该示例使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.HelpButton%2A>属性对话框中的标题栏中显示帮助按钮。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the minimum size the form can be resized to.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置窗体可调整到的最小大小。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> that represents the minimum size for the form.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" />，表示该窗体的最小大小。

trans-unit.source: This property enables you to limit the size of a form to a specified minimum size.
trans-unit.target: 此属性可限制为指定的最小大小的窗体的大小。

trans-unit.source: You can use this feature to prevent a user from sizing a window to an undesirable size.
trans-unit.target: 此功能可用于防止用户将窗口调整为不合需要的大小。

trans-unit.source: If this property is set to a <xref:System.Drawing.Size> object that is 0 in height and 0 in width, the form will have no minimum size beyond the limits set by Windows.
trans-unit.target: 如果此属性设置为<xref:System.Drawing.Size>是 0 高度和宽度，窗体中的为 0 的对象将具有由 Windows 设置的限制之外没有最小大小。

trans-unit.source: The values of the height or width within the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> object are less than zero.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> 对象内的高或宽的值小于零。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Form.MinimumSize" /> property has changed.
trans-unit.target: 在 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Form.MinimumSize" /> 属性的值更改后发生。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.MinimumSizeChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.MinimumSizeChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>与<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或追加到一个多行消息<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> named `Form1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>名为`Form1`。

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.MinimumSizeChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 然后，确保与事件处理程序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.MinimumSizeChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether this form is displayed modally.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否有模式地显示此窗体。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the form is displayed modally; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果该窗体进行模式显示，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: When a form is displayed modally, no input (keyboard or mouse click) can occur except to objects on the modal form.
trans-unit.target: 有模式地显示窗体时，不需要输入 （键盘或鼠标单击） 能对模式的窗体上的对象进行除外。

trans-unit.source: The program must hide or close a modal form (usually in response to some user action) before input to another form can occur.
trans-unit.target: 该程序必须隐藏或关闭模式中的窗体 （通常对某些用户执行任何操作的响应） 到另一种形式的输入之前进行。

trans-unit.source: Forms that are displayed modally are typically used as dialog boxes in an application.
trans-unit.target: 有模式地显示的窗体通常用作应用程序中的对话框。

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to determine whether a form that you have obtained from a method or property has been displayed modally.
trans-unit.target: 此属性可用于确定你获取从方法或属性的窗体是否已有模式地显示。

trans-unit.source: To display a form modally use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ShowDialog%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要显示窗体以模式方式使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ShowDialog%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Modal%2A> property to determine if a form is displayed as a modal form.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Modal%2A>属性来确定是否窗体将显示为模式的窗体。

trans-unit.source: If it is not the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormBorderStyle%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.TopLevel%2A> properties are changed to make the form a non-top-level form with a tool window border.
trans-unit.target: 如果不是<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormBorderStyle%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.TopLevel%2A>属性将更改以使工具窗口边框的非顶级窗体的窗体。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: 包含事件数据的 <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" />。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Activated" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 引发 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Activated" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.OnActivated%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.OnActivated%2A> 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。

trans-unit.source: Overriding this method is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 重写此方法是处理派生类中的事件的首选的技术。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Form.OnActivated(System.EventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Form.OnActivated(System.EventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: 在派生类中重写 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Form.OnActivated(System.EventArgs)" /> 时，一定要调用基类的 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Form.OnActivated(System.EventArgs)" /> 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> that contains the data.
trans-unit.target: 包该数据的 <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" />。

trans-unit.target: 引发 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Closed" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.OnClosed%2A> method is obsolete in the .NET Framework version 2.0; use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.OnFormClosed%2A> method instead.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.OnClosed%2A>方法是.NET Framework 2.0 版中过时的; 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.OnFormClosed%2A>方法相反。

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。

trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.OnFormClosed%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.OnFormClosed%2A> 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。

trans-unit.source: Overriding this method is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 重写此方法是处理派生类中的事件的首选的技术。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.OnClosed%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.OnClosing%2A> methods are not called when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.Exit%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method is called to exit your application.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.OnClosed%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.OnClosing%2A>方法不调用时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.Exit%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>调用方法以退出应用程序。

trans-unit.source: If you have validation code in either of these methods that must be executed, you should call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Close%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method for each open form individually before calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.Exit%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果你有必须执行这些方法之一的验证代码，则应调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Close%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>单独之前调用每个打开的窗体的方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.Exit%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to override the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.OnClosed%2A> method in a class derived from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> .

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Closing> to test if the text in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> has changed.

trans-unit.source: If it has, the user is asked whether to save the changes to a file.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.OnMinimumSizeChanged%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.OnMinimumSizeChanged%2A> 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Form.OnMinimumSizeChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Form.OnMinimumSizeChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: 在派生类中重写 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Form.OnMinimumSizeChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> 时，一定要调用基类的 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Form.OnMinimumSizeChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

trans-unit.target: 包含事件数据的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ResizeBegin> event will only be raised if the form's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CanRaiseEvents%2A> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ResizeBegin>将仅引发事件，如果窗体的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CanRaiseEvents%2A>属性设置为`true`。

trans-unit.target: 引发 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Form.RightToLeftLayoutChanged" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: If the current form or one of its parents is disposing of resources, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.OnRightToLeftLayoutChanged%2A> method will return without performing any action.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前窗体或其父级之一正在释放资源，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.OnRightToLeftLayoutChanged%2A>方法将返回而不执行任何操作。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft%2A> property of the form has a value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft.Yes>, then the handles of the form and its child controls will be recreated through calls to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RecreateHandle%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft%2A>窗体的属性具有的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft.Yes>，然后将通过对的调用中重新创建窗体及其子控件的句柄<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RecreateHandle%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the opacity level of the form.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置窗体的不透明度级别。

trans-unit.source: The level of opacity for the form.
trans-unit.target: 窗体的不透明度级别。

trans-unit.source: The default is 1.00.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 1.00。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Opacity%2A> property enables you to specify a level of transparency for the form and its controls.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Opacity%2A>属性使您能够指定为窗体及其控件的透明度级别。

trans-unit.source: When this property is set to a value less than 100 percent (1.00), the entire form, including borders, is made more transparent.
trans-unit.target: 当此属性设置为小于 100%(1.00) 的值时，整个窗体中，包括边框、 进行更加透明。

trans-unit.source: Setting this property to a value of 0 percent (0.00) makes the form completely invisible.
trans-unit.target: 此属性设置为值为 0%(0.00) 使窗体完全不可见。

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to provide different levels of transparency or to provide effects such as phasing a form in or out of view.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用此属性，以提供不同级别的透明度或提供如窗体逐渐加入或退出视图的效果。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can phase a form into view by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Opacity%2A> property to a value of 0 percent (0.00) and gradually increasing the value until it reaches 100 percent (1.00).
trans-unit.target: 例如，你可以一个窗体逐渐到视图通过设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Opacity%2A>属性 0%(0.00)，而且逐渐增加的值，直至其达到 100%(1.00) 的值。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Opacity%2A> differs from the transparency provided by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.TransparencyKey%2A>, which only makes a form and its controls completely transparent if they are the same color as the value specified in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.TransparencyKey%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Opacity%2A> 不同于由提供的透明度<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.TransparencyKey%2A>、 这只是使窗体和其控件完全透明如果它们是中指定的值与相同的颜色<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.TransparencyKey%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: This property is not supported when <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.RightToLeftLayout%2A> is `true`.
trans-unit.target: 此属性不是支持时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.RightToLeftLayout%2A>是`true`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Opacity%2A> property depends on the Layered Windows API that was introduced with Windows 2000.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Opacity%2A>属性依赖于分层的 Windows API 引入了在 Windows 2000 中使用。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the "Layered Windows: A New Way to Use Translucency and Transparency Effects in Windows Applications" in the Platform SDK documentation at [http://msdn.microsoft.com](http://msdn.microsoft.com/).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅"分层 Windows:: 新方式对使用透明度和透明度效果在 Windows 应用程序"中的平台 SDK 文档[ http://msdn.microsoft.com ](http://msdn.microsoft.com/)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to create a form that is displayed with an opacity level of 75 percent.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何创建带有 75%的不透明度级别显示窗体。

trans-unit.source: The code example creates a new form that is positioned in the center of the screen with an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Opacity%2A> property set to change the opacity level of the form.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例创建一个在与屏幕的中心中放置的新窗体<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Opacity%2A>属性设置以更改窗体的不透明度级别。

trans-unit.source: The code example also sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Size%2A> property to provide a larger sized form than the default size of the form.
trans-unit.target: 代码示例还将设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Size%2A>属性，以提供更大大小超过默认大小的窗体的窗体。

trans-unit.source: This code example was written under the assumption that the method defined in this example is called from another form in an event handler or other method.
trans-unit.target: 编写此代码示例时，在此示例中定义此方法叫做从事件处理程序或其他方法中的另一种形式的假设。

trans-unit.source: Gets an array of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Form" /> objects that represent all forms that are owned by this form.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Form" /> 对象的数组，这些对象表示此窗体拥有的所有窗体。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Form" /> array that represents the owned forms for this form.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Form" /> 数组，它表示此窗体的附属窗体。

trans-unit.source: This property returns an array that contains all forms that are owned by this form.
trans-unit.target: 此属性返回一个数组，包含此窗体拥有的所有窗体。

trans-unit.source: To make a form owned by another form, call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.AddOwnedForm%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要使窗体拥有的另一种形式，调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.AddOwnedForm%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The form assigned to the owner form will remain owned until the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.RemoveOwnedForm%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: 分配给所有者窗体的窗体将保持拥有直到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.RemoveOwnedForm%2A>调用方法。

trans-unit.source: You can also make a form owned by another by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Owner%2A> property with a reference to its owner form.
trans-unit.target: 你还可以通过设置拥有的另一个窗体<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Owner%2A>与对其所有者窗体的引用的属性。

trans-unit.source: When a form is owned by another form, it is closed or hidden with the owner form.
trans-unit.target: 当窗体拥有的另一种形式时，它被关闭或隐藏与所有者窗体。

trans-unit.source: For example, consider a form named `Form2` that is owned by a form named `Form1`.
trans-unit.target: 例如，考虑名为窗体`Form2`归名为窗体`Form1`。

trans-unit.source: If `Form1` is closed or minimized, `Form2` is also closed or hidden.
trans-unit.target: 如果`Form1`关闭或最小化，`Form2`也会关闭或隐藏。

trans-unit.source: Owned forms are also never displayed behind their owner form.
trans-unit.target: 附属窗体还永远不会显示在其所有者的窗体后面。

trans-unit.source: You can use owned forms for windows such as find and replace windows, which should not be displayed behind the owner form when the owner form is selected.
trans-unit.target: 可以拥有的窗体以 windows 使用如查找和替换 windows，不应在选择所有者窗体时显示在所有者窗体。

trans-unit.source: If the form is a multiple-document interface (MDI) parent form, this property will return all forms that are displayed with the exception of any MDI child forms that are currently open.
trans-unit.target: 如果窗体是多文档界面 (MDI) 父窗体，该属性将返回当前任何 MDI 子窗体除了显示的所有窗体打开。

trans-unit.source: To obtain the MDI child forms opened in an MDI parent form, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.MdiChildren%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要获取在 MDI 父窗体中打开的 MDI 子窗体，请使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.MdiChildren%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.OwnedForms%2A> property to modify all forms owned by the owner form.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.OwnedForms%2A>属性修改所有者窗体拥有的所有窗体。

trans-unit.source: The first method in the example adds forms to the array of owned forms associated with the owned form.
trans-unit.target: 在示例中第一种方法将窗体添加到与附属窗体的附属窗体的数组。

trans-unit.source: The second method loops through all owned forms and changes the caption.
trans-unit.target: 第二种方法遍历所有附属窗体，并更改标题。

trans-unit.source: This example requires that both methods are called by an event or other method of a form.
trans-unit.target: 此示例需要这两种方法调用的事件或表单的其他方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the form that owns this form.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置拥有此窗体的窗体。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Form" /> that represents the form that is the owner of this form.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Form" />，表示作为此窗体的所有者的窗体。

trans-unit.source: To make a form owned by another form, assign its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Owner%2A> property a reference to the form that will be the owner.
trans-unit.target: 要将另一个窗体拥有的窗体，将分配其<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Owner%2A>的引用将成为所有者的窗体的属性。

trans-unit.source: When a form is owned by another form, it is closed or hidden with the owner form.
trans-unit.target: 当窗体拥有的另一种形式时，它被关闭或隐藏与所有者窗体。

trans-unit.source: For example, consider a form named `Form2` that is owned by a form named `Form1`.
trans-unit.target: 例如，考虑名为窗体`Form2`归名为窗体`Form1`。

trans-unit.source: If `Form1` is closed or minimized, `Form2` is also closed or hidden.Owned forms are also never displayed behind their owner form.
trans-unit.target: 如果`Form1`关闭或最小化，`Form2`也会关闭或隐藏。附属窗体还永远不会显示在其所有者的窗体后面。

trans-unit.source: You can use owned forms for windows such as find and replace windows, which should not disappear when the owner form is selected.
trans-unit.target: 你可以拥有的窗体以 windows 使用如查找和替换 windows，选中所有者窗体时应不会消失。

trans-unit.source: To determine the forms that are owned by a parent form, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.OwnedForms%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要确定属于父窗体的窗体，请使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.OwnedForms%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: A top-level window cannot have an owner.
trans-unit.target: 顶级窗口不能具有所有者。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Message" />, passed by reference, that represents the Win32 message to process.
trans-unit.target: 通过引用传递的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Message" />，它表示要处理的 Win32 消息。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Keys" /> values that represents the key to process.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Keys" /> 值之一，表示要处理的键。

trans-unit.source: Processes a command key.
trans-unit.target: 处理命令键。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the keystroke was processed and consumed by the control; otherwise, <see langword="false" /> to allow further processing.
trans-unit.target: 如果控件处理并使用击键，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />，以允许进一步处理。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ProcessCmdKey%2A> method overrides the base
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ProcessCmdKey%2A>方法重写基

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContainerControl.ProcessCmdKey%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> implementation to provide additional handling of main menu command keys and MDI accelerators.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContainerControl.ProcessCmdKey%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> 实现以提供的主菜单命令键和 MDI 快捷键的其他处理。

trans-unit.source: For information about trapping keystrokes, see "How to trap keystrokes in controls by using Visual C#" and "How to trap keystrokes in .NET controls by using Visual Basic .NET" in the Microsoft Knowledge Base at http://support.microsoft.com.
trans-unit.target: 有关捕获击键的信息，请参阅"如何使用 Visual C# 陷阱控件中的键击"和"如何捕获.NET 中的键击控件通过使用 Visual Basic.NET"Microsoft 知识库中在http://support.microsoft.com。

trans-unit.source: The character to process.
trans-unit.target: 要处理的字符。

trans-unit.source: Processes a dialog character.
trans-unit.target: 处理对话框字符。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the character was processed by the control; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果字符已由控件处理，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Keys" /> values that represents the key to process.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Keys" /> 值之一，表示要处理的键。

trans-unit.source: Processes a dialog box key.
trans-unit.target: 处理对话框键。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the keystroke was processed and consumed by the control; otherwise, <see langword="false" /> to allow further processing.
trans-unit.target: 如果控件处理并使用击键，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />，以允许进一步处理。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ProcessDialogKey%2A> method overrides the base <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContainerControl.ProcessDialogKey%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> implementation to provide additional handling of the RETURN and ESCAPE keys in dialog boxes.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ProcessDialogKey%2A>方法重写基<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContainerControl.ProcessDialogKey%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>实现以提供的对话框中的返回和转义键的其他处理。

trans-unit.source: The method performs no processing on keystrokes that include the ALT or CONTROL modifiers.
trans-unit.target: 该方法对包括的 ALT 或控件的修饰符的击键执行不会进行处理。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Message" />, passed by reference, that represents the window message to process.
trans-unit.target: 通过引用传递的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Message" />，表示要处理的窗口消息。

trans-unit.source: Previews a keyboard message.
trans-unit.target: 预览键盘消息。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the message was processed by the control; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果消息已由控件处理，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The character to process.
trans-unit.target: 要处理的字符。

trans-unit.source: Processes a mnemonic character.
trans-unit.target: 处理助记键字符。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the character was processed as a mnemonic by the control; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果字符由控件作为助记键处理，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to cycle forward through the controls in the ContainerControl; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果在 ContainerControl 内的控件中向前循环，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Selects the next available control and makes it the active control.
trans-unit.target: 选择下一个可用控件并使其成为活动控件。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if a control is selected; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果选择了一个控件，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Form" /> representing the form to remove from the list of owned forms for this form.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Form" />，表示要从此窗体的附属窗体列表中移除的窗体。

trans-unit.source: Removes an owned form from this form.
trans-unit.target: 从此窗体移除附属窗体。

trans-unit.source: The form assigned to the owner form remains owned until the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.RemoveOwnedForm%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: 分配给所有者窗体的窗体将保持被拥有直到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.RemoveOwnedForm%2A>调用方法。

trans-unit.source: In addition to removing the owned form from the list of owned form, this method also sets the owner form to `null`.
trans-unit.target: 除了附属窗体移除附属窗体的列表，此方法还将所有者窗体设置为`null`。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a form enters resizing mode.
trans-unit.target: 窗体进入大小调整模式时发生。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ResizeBegin> event is raised when the user begins to resize a form, typically by clicking and dragging one of the borders or the sizing grip located on the lower-right corner of the form.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ResizeBegin>在用户开始调整窗体中，大小通常，通过单击和拖动其中一个边框或位于在窗体右下角的大小调整手柄时引发事件。

trans-unit.source: This action puts the form into a modal sizing loop until the resize operation is completed.
trans-unit.target: 此操作将窗体进入大小调整模式循环，直到大小调整操作完成。

trans-unit.source: Typically, the following set of events occurs during a resize operation:
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，调整大小操作期间发生以下一组事件：

trans-unit.source: A single <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ResizeBegin> event occurs as the form enters resizing mode.
trans-unit.target: 单个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ResizeBegin>事件发生窗体进入大小调整模式。

trans-unit.source: Zero or more pairs of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Resize> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SizeChanged> events occur as the form's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Size%2A> is modified.
trans-unit.target: 零个或多个对<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Resize>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SizeChanged>事件发生为窗体的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Size%2A>被修改。

trans-unit.source: A single <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ResizeEnd> event occurs as the form exits resizing mode.
trans-unit.target: 单个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ResizeEnd>事件发生窗体退出大小调整模式。

trans-unit.source: Just clicking without dragging on a border or resizing grip will generate the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ResizeBegin> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ResizeEnd> events without any intermediate <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Resize> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SizeChanged> event pairs.
trans-unit.target: 只通过单击而无需拖动边框或大小调整手柄将生成<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ResizeBegin>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ResizeEnd>事件而无需任何中间<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Resize>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SizeChanged>事件对。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ResizeBegin> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ResizeEnd> pair of events is also raised when the user moves the form, typically by clicking and dragging on the caption bar.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ResizeBegin>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ResizeEnd>当用户将窗体中，通常通过单击和拖动在标题栏上，也会引发的事件对。

trans-unit.source: These events are not generated by programmatic manipulation of the form, for example by changing the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Size%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Location%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 这些事件不由生成的窗体中，编程操作例如通过更改<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Size%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Location%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ResizeBegin> event.
trans-unit.target: 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ResizeBegin>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>与<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或追加到一个多行消息<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> named `Form1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>名为`Form1`。

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ResizeBegin> event.
trans-unit.target: 然后，确保与事件处理程序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ResizeBegin>事件。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a form exits resizing mode.
trans-unit.target: 窗体退出大小调整模式时发生。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ResizeEnd> event is raised when the user finishes resizing a form, typically by dragging one of the borders or the sizing grip located on the lower-right corner of the form, and then releasing it.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ResizeEnd>用户完成调整大小操作窗体中，通常通过拖动其中一个边框或大小调整手柄的右下角的窗体中，然后将其释放时，将引发事件。

trans-unit.source: For more information about the resizing operation, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ResizeBegin> event.
trans-unit.target: 有关大小调整操作的详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ResizeBegin>事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ResizeEnd> event is also generated after the user moves a form, typically by clicking and dragging on the caption bar.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ResizeEnd>之后用户移动窗体中，通常通过单击和拖动在标题栏上，也会生成事件。

trans-unit.source: This event is not generated by programmatic manipulation of the form, for example by changing the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Size%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Location%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 此事件不由生成的窗体中，编程操作例如通过更改<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Size%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Location%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ResizeEnd> event.
trans-unit.target: 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ResizeEnd>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>与<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或追加到一个多行消息<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> named `Form1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>名为`Form1`。

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ResizeEnd> event.
trans-unit.target: 然后，确保与事件处理程序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ResizeEnd>事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the location and size of the form in its normal window state.
trans-unit.target: 获取窗体在其正常窗口状态下的位置和大小。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> that contains the location and size of the form in the normal window state.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" />，包含窗体在正常窗口状态下的位置和大小。

trans-unit.source: Typically, you use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.RestoreBounds%2A> property to track the user's window size and position preferences for the form in its normal window state.
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.RestoreBounds%2A>属性跟踪用户的窗口大小，并在其正常窗口状态放置窗体的首选项。

trans-unit.source: You should track both the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.WindowState%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.RestoreBounds%2A> properties when tracking the user's window preferences.
trans-unit.target: 应跟踪这两个值的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.WindowState%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.RestoreBounds%2A>属性跟踪用户的窗口首选项时。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.RestoreBounds%2A> property is valid only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.WindowState%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> class is not equal to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FormWindowState.Normal>.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.RestoreBounds%2A>属性是仅当<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.WindowState%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>类是否不等于<xref:System.Windows.Forms.FormWindowState.Normal>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether right-to-left mirror placement is turned on.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否打开从右向左的镜像放置。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if right-to-left mirror placement is turned on; otherwise, <see langword="false" /> for standard child control placement.
trans-unit.target: 如果打开了从右到左的镜像放置，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则对于标准子控件放置，为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.RightToLeftLayout%2A> property is primarily useful for developing world-ready forms for worldwide audiences.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.RightToLeftLayout%2A>属性是主要用于为全球受众开发全球通用的窗体。

trans-unit.source: Many forms are designed so that controls are laid out on a form in a left-to-right fashion.
trans-unit.target: 许多窗体经过专门设计，因此，以从左到右的方式在窗体上的控件进行布局。

trans-unit.source: These forms are compatible with languages that follow this writing direction.
trans-unit.target: 这些窗体将遵循此编写指导的语言与兼容。

trans-unit.source: However, when you display the same forms to users of right-to-left languages, it is often preferable to reverse the order of the controls on the form.
trans-unit.target: 但是，当向右到左语言的用户显示相同的窗体时，通常最好是反向窗体上控件的顺序。

trans-unit.source: If both the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.RightToLeftLayout%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft%2A> properties are `true`, mirroring will be turned on for the form, and control placement and text flow will be right-to-left.
trans-unit.target: 如果这两个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.RightToLeftLayout%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft%2A>属性`true`，镜像将打开窗体，并且控件放置和文本流将为从右到左。

trans-unit.source: Unlike <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.RightToLeftLayout%2A> does not inherit.
trans-unit.target: 与不同<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft%2A>，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.RightToLeftLayout%2A>不会继承。

trans-unit.source: If you want it to take effect for child controls, you must set it on each child control that you want mirrored.
trans-unit.target: 如果您希望其生效子控件，你必须将它设置每个要镜像的子控件。

trans-unit.source: Owner draw is not supported when <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.RightToLeftLayout%2A> is set to `Yes`.
trans-unit.target: 不是所有者描述支持时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.RightToLeftLayout%2A>设置为`Yes`。

trans-unit.source: The owner draw events will still occur, but the behavior of any code you author in these events is not defined.
trans-unit.target: 仍将发生所有者 draw 事件，但未定义这些事件中编写任何代码的行为。

trans-unit.source: Additionally, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackgroundImage%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Opacity%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.TransparencyKey%2A>, and the painting events are not supported.
trans-unit.target: 此外， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackgroundImage%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Opacity%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.TransparencyKey%2A>，并且不支持绘制事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.RightToLeftLayout%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft%2A> properties cause the following Win32 API window styles to be set:
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.RightToLeftLayout%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft%2A>属性会导致以下 Win32 API 窗口样式设置：

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft%2A> is set to `Yes` and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.RightToLeftLayout%2A> is set to `true`, Windows Forms sets the `WS_EX_LAYOUTRTL` window style, and removes the `WS_EX_RIGHT` and `WS_EX_RTLREADING` styles.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft%2A>设置为`Yes`和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.RightToLeftLayout%2A>设置为`true`，Windows 窗体设置`WS_EX_LAYOUTRTL`窗口样式，并移除`WS_EX_RIGHT`和`WS_EX_RTLREADING`样式。

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft%2A> is set to `Yes` but <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.RightToLeftLayout%2A> is set to `No`, Windows Forms sets the `WS_EX_RIGHT` and `WS_EX_RTLREADING` window styles.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft%2A>设置为`Yes`但<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.RightToLeftLayout%2A>设置为`No`，Windows 窗体设置`WS_EX_RIGHT`和`WS_EX_RTLREADING`窗口样式。

trans-unit.source: Changing the value of this property raises the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.RightToLeftLayoutChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 更改此属性的值引发<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.RightToLeftLayoutChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: For more information about globalization issues, see [Best Practices for Developing World-Ready Applications](~/docs/standard/globalization-localization/best-practices-for-developing-world-ready-apps.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关的全球化问题的详细信息，请参阅[开发全球通用应用程序的最佳实践](~/docs/standard/globalization-localization/best-practices-for-developing-world-ready-apps.md)。

trans-unit.source: Occurs after the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Form.RightToLeftLayout" /> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 更改 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Form.RightToLeftLayout" /> 属性值之后发生。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.RightToLeftLayout%2A> properties are typically used in developing World-Ready applications.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.RightToLeftLayout%2A>属性通常用在开发全球通用应用程序。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.RightToLeftLayoutChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.RightToLeftLayoutChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>与<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或追加到一个多行消息<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> named `Form1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>名为`Form1`。

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.RightToLeftLayoutChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 然后，确保与事件处理程序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.RightToLeftLayoutChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: The factor by which the height and width of the control are scaled.
trans-unit.target: 控件高度和宽度的缩放因子。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified" /> value that specifies the bounds of the control to use when defining its size and position.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified" /> 值，指定在定义控件的大小和位置时要使用的控件边界。

trans-unit.source: Scales the location, size, padding, and margin of a control.
trans-unit.target: 缩放控件的位置、大小、空白和边距。

trans-unit.source: Percentage to scale the form horizontally
trans-unit.target: 水平缩放窗体的百分比

trans-unit.source: Percentage to scale the form vertically
trans-unit.target: 垂直缩放窗体的百分比

trans-unit.source: Performs scaling of the form.
trans-unit.target: 执行窗体缩放操作。

trans-unit.source: If set to true that the active control is changed
trans-unit.target: 如果设置为 true，则更改活动控件

trans-unit.source: If directed is true, then this controls the direction in which focus is moved.
trans-unit.target: 如果 directed 为 true，则它控制焦点移动的方向。

trans-unit.source: If this is <see langword="true" />, then the next control is selected; otherwise, the previous control is selected.
trans-unit.target: 如果此项为 <see langword="true" />，则下一个控件被选定；否则，上一个控件被选定。

trans-unit.source: Selects this form, and optionally selects the next or previous control.
trans-unit.target: 选择此窗体，并且可以选择下一个或上一个控件。

trans-unit.source: For changing focus.
trans-unit.target: 用于更改焦点。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionWindow.AllWindows" />.
trans-unit.target: 关联枚举：<see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionWindow.AllWindows" />。

trans-unit.source: The new <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Left" /> property value of the control.
trans-unit.target: 控件的新 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Left" /> 属性值。

trans-unit.source: The new <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Top" /> property value of the control.
trans-unit.target: 控件的新 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Top" /> 属性值。

trans-unit.source: The new <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width" /> property value of the control.
trans-unit.target: 控件的新 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width" /> 属性值。

trans-unit.source: The new <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height" /> property value of the control.
trans-unit.target: 控件的新 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height" /> 属性值。

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified" /> 值的按位组合。

trans-unit.source: Performs the work of setting the specified bounds of this control.
trans-unit.target: 执行设置该控件的指定边界的工作。

trans-unit.source: Requested width of the client region.
trans-unit.target: 请求的工作区宽度。

trans-unit.source: Requested height of the client region.
trans-unit.target: 请求的工作区高度。

trans-unit.source: Sets the client size of the form.
trans-unit.target: 设置窗体的工作区大小。

trans-unit.source: This will adjust the bounds of the form to make the client size the requested size.
trans-unit.target: 这将调整窗体的界限，以将工作区大小设置为请求的大小。

trans-unit.source: The x-coordinate of the form's location.
trans-unit.target: 窗体位置的 x 坐标。

trans-unit.source: The y-coordinate of the form's location.
trans-unit.target: 窗体位置的 y 坐标。

trans-unit.source: The width of the form.
trans-unit.target: 窗体的宽度。

trans-unit.source: The height of the form.
trans-unit.target: 窗体的高度。

trans-unit.source: Sets the bounds of the form in desktop coordinates.
trans-unit.target: 以桌面坐标设置窗体的边界。

trans-unit.source: Desktop coordinates are based on the working area of the screen, which excludes the taskbar.
trans-unit.target: 桌面坐标相对于屏幕，其中不包括任务栏的工作区域。

trans-unit.source: You can use this method to set the position and size of your form on the desktop.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用此方法在桌面上设置的位置和大小的窗体。

trans-unit.source: Since desktop coordinates are based on the working area of the form, you can use this method to ensure that your form is completely visible on the desktop.
trans-unit.target: 因为桌面坐标基于窗体的工作区域，可以使用此方法以确保你的窗体是完全在桌面上可见。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.SetDesktopBounds%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.SetDesktopBounds%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: To run this example, paste the following code in a form that contains a button named `Button2`.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此示例中，粘贴以下代码中包含名为的按钮的窗体`Button2`。

trans-unit.source: Ensure all events are associated with their event handlers.
trans-unit.target: 确保所有事件都都其事件处理程序关联。

trans-unit.source: The x-coordinate of the form's location.
trans-unit.target: 窗体位置的 x 坐标。

trans-unit.source: The y-coordinate of the form's location.
trans-unit.target: 窗体位置的 y 坐标。

trans-unit.source: Sets the location of the form in desktop coordinates.
trans-unit.target: 以桌面坐标设置窗体的位置。

trans-unit.source: Desktop coordinates are based on the working area of the screen, which excludes the taskbar.
trans-unit.target: 桌面坐标相对于屏幕，其中不包括任务栏的工作区域。

trans-unit.source: You can use this method to position your form on the desktop.
trans-unit.target: 此方法可用于在桌面上定位你的窗体。

trans-unit.source: Since desktop coordinates are based on the working area of the form, you can use this method to ensure that your form is completely visible on the desktop.
trans-unit.target: 因为桌面坐标基于窗体的工作区域，可以使用此方法以确保你的窗体是完全在桌面上可见。

trans-unit.source: This method is intended to be used primarily for top-level forms; use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.LayoutMdi%2A> method to position multiple-document interface (MDI) child forms.
trans-unit.target: 此方法应主要用于顶级窗体;使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.LayoutMdi%2A>方法定位多文档界面 (MDI) 子窗体。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.SetDesktopLocation%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Activate%2A> members.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.SetDesktopLocation%2A>，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Activate%2A>成员。

trans-unit.source: To run the example, paste the following code in a form called `Form1` containing a button called `Button1` and two `Label` controls called `Label1` and `Label2`.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行该示例，请将以下代码粘贴在窗体调用`Form1`包含一个按钮调用`Button1`和两个`Label`控件称为`Label1`和`Label2`。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to make the control visible; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示使控件可见；<see langword="false" /> 表示使控件不可见。

trans-unit.source: Sets the control to the specified visible state.
trans-unit.target: 将控件设置为指定的可见状态。

trans-unit.source: Any object that implements <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.IWin32Window" /> and represents the top-level window that will own this form.
trans-unit.target: 任何实现 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.IWin32Window" /> 并表示将拥有此窗体的顶级窗口的对象。

trans-unit.source: Shows the form with the specified owner to the user.
trans-unit.target: 向用户显示具有指定所有者的窗体。

trans-unit.source: You can use this method to display a non-modal form.
trans-unit.target: 此方法可用于显示的非模式窗体。

trans-unit.source: When you use this method, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Owner%2A> property of the form is set to `owner`.
trans-unit.target: 当你使用此方法，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Owner%2A>窗体的属性设置为`owner`。

trans-unit.source: The non-modal form can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Owner%2A> property to get information about the owning form.
trans-unit.target: 非模式窗体可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Owner%2A>属性以获取有关所属的窗体的信息。

trans-unit.source: Calling this method is identical to setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Owner%2A> property of the non-modal and then calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Show> method.
trans-unit.target: 调用此方法等同于设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Owner%2A>非模式的属性，然后再调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Show>方法。

trans-unit.source: Showing the form is equivalent to setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Visible%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 显示窗体等效于设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Visible%2A>属性`true`。

trans-unit.source: After the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Show%2A> method is called, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Visible%2A> property returns a value of `true` until the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Hide%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: 后<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Show%2A>调用方法时，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Visible%2A>属性返回的值`true`直到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Hide%2A>调用方法。

trans-unit.source: The form being shown is already visible.
trans-unit.target: 要显示的窗体已经可见。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The form specified in the <paramref name="owner" /> parameter is the same as the form being shown.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="owner" /> 参数中指定的窗体就是显示的窗体。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The form being shown is disabled.
trans-unit.target: 所显示窗体被禁用。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The form being shown is not a top-level window.
trans-unit.target: 显示的窗体不是顶级窗口。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The form being shown as a dialog box is already a modal form.
trans-unit.target: 显示为对话框的窗体已经是模式窗体。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The current process is not running in user interactive mode (for more information, see <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.UserInteractive" />).
trans-unit.target: 当前进程不是以用户交互模式运行的（有关更多信息，请参见 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.UserInteractive" />）。

trans-unit.source: Shows the form as a modal dialog box.
trans-unit.target: 将窗体显示为模式对话框。

trans-unit.source: Shows the form as a modal dialog box.
trans-unit.target: 将窗体显示为模式对话框。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DialogResult" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DialogResult" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: You can use this method to display a modal dialog box in your application.
trans-unit.target: 此方法可用于在你的应用程序中显示模式对话框。

trans-unit.source: When this method is called, the code following it is not executed until after the dialog box is closed.
trans-unit.target: 当调用此方法时，后面的代码后关闭该对话框不执行之前。

trans-unit.source: The dialog box can be assigned one of the values of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DialogResult> enumeration by assigning it to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button.DialogResult%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> on the form or by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.DialogResult%2A> property of the form in code.
trans-unit.target: 对话框中可以分配的值之一<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DialogResult>枚举通过将其分配给<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button.DialogResult%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>窗体上或通过设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.DialogResult%2A>的窗体代码中的属性。

trans-unit.source: This value is then returned by this method.
trans-unit.target: 此方法然后返回此值。

trans-unit.source: You can use this return value to determine how to process the actions that occurred in the dialog box.
trans-unit.target: 此返回值可用于确定如何处理发生在对话框中的操作。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the dialog box was closed and returned the `DialogResult.Cancel` value through this method, you could prevent code following the call to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ShowDialog%2A> from executing.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果对话框已关闭并返回`DialogResult.Cancel`值通过这种方法，你可以阻止之后对调用代码<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ShowDialog%2A>执行。

trans-unit.source: When a form is displayed as a modal dialog box, clicking the **Close** button (the button with an X at the upper-right corner of the form) causes the form to be hidden and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.DialogResult%2A> property to be set to `DialogResult.Cancel`.
trans-unit.target: 当窗体显示为模式对话框中时，单击**关闭**按钮 （带有窗体的右上角的 X 按钮） 将导致要隐藏的窗体和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.DialogResult%2A>属性设置为`DialogResult.Cancel`。

trans-unit.source: Unlike non-modal forms, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Close%2A> method is not called by the .NET Framework when the user clicks the close form button of a dialog box or sets the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.DialogResult%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 与非模式窗体，不同<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Close%2A>方法不在用户单击对话框中的关闭窗体按钮或设置的值时由.NET Framework 调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.DialogResult%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Instead the form is hidden and can be shown again without creating a new instance of the dialog box.
trans-unit.target: 改为窗体将隐藏，并且可以再次显示而无需创建对话框中的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Because a form displayed as a dialog box is hidden instead of closed, you must call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Dispose%2A> method of the form when the form is no longer needed by your application.
trans-unit.target: 因为窗体显示为对话框中隐藏而不是关闭，你必须调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Dispose%2A>时窗体应用程序不再需要该窗体的方法。

trans-unit.source: This version of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ShowDialog%2A> method does not specify a form or control as its owner.
trans-unit.target: 此版本的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ShowDialog%2A>方法没有指定窗体或控件作为其所有者。

trans-unit.source: When this version is called, the currently active window is made the owner of the dialog box.
trans-unit.target: 当调用此版本时，当前处于活动状态窗口进行对话框框的所有者。

trans-unit.source: If you want to specify a specific owner, use the other version of this method.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想要指定特定的所有者，则使用此方法的其他版本。

trans-unit.source: The following code example displays a form as a modal dialog box and evaluates the return value of the dialog box before determining whether to read the value of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control on the dialog box form.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例将窗体显示为模式对话框，并才能决定是否要读取的值计算对话框中的返回值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>对话框框中窗体上的控件。

trans-unit.source: This example requires that a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> named `testDialog` is created and that it contains a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control named `TextBox1`.
trans-unit.target: 此示例需要<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>名为`testDialog`创建及其所含的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>控件名为`TextBox1`。

trans-unit.source: Furthermore, the example requires that code in this example is contained and called from a different <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> in order to display `testDialog` as a modal dialog box.
trans-unit.target: 此外，该示例需要在此示例中的代码是包含和从其他调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>为了显示`testDialog`为模式对话框。

trans-unit.source: The example uses the version of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ShowDialog%2A> that specifies an owner for the dialog box.
trans-unit.target: 此示例使用的版本<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ShowDialog%2A>，它指定所有者为对话框。

trans-unit.source: The form being shown is already visible.
trans-unit.target: 要显示的窗体已经可见。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The form being shown is disabled.
trans-unit.target: 所显示窗体被禁用。

trans-unit.target: 或
